GSP28durdhpru:300: tad ayam arthaḥ -- tatpratipattaye śabdānāṃ sandarbho
GSP28durdhpru:301: nārambhaṇīyo 'pi syāt, kiṃ punaḥ śravaṇīya iti |
GSP28durdhpru:303: yathā kākadantaprayojanābhāvāt na tatparīkṣā ārambhaṇīyā prekṣāvatā |
GSP28durdhpru:304: tasmād asya prakaraṇasyārambhaṇīyatvaṃ darśayatā abhidheyaprayojanam anenocyate |
GSP28durdhpru:305: yasmāt samyagjñānapūrvikā sarvapuruṣārthasiddhiḥ, tasmāt tatpratipattaye idam ārabhyata ity ayam atra vākyārthaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:306: atra ca prakaraṇābhidheyasya samyagjñānasya sarvapuruṣārthasiddhihetutvam prayojanam uktam
GSP28durdhpru:308: yathaitad darśitaṃ tadvat sarvaṃ draṣṭvyam iti yathāśabdārthaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:311: parīkṣaṇaṃ vā parīkṣā vimṛṣyāvadhāraṇaṃ tādarthyāt śāstram api tathā |
GSP28durdhpru:312: nanu niṣprayojanābhidheyaṃ mārambhi, vacanena tv anena kiṃ kriyata ity āha
GSP28durdhpru:314: yasmān niṣprayonanābhidheyaṃ nārabhyate tasmād ārambhaṇīyatvaṃ darśayatā ārambhayogyam evedaṃ mayārabhyata iti
GSP28durdhpru:315: prakāśayatā, ārambhaṇīyate ca darśite śravaṇīyatvam api nimittasāmyād
GSP28durdhpru:317: nanu ca samyagjñānapūrvikā sarvapuruṣārthasiddhir ity anenaikadeśenābhidheyaprayojanam uktam, na samuditena |
GSP28durdhpru:320: vākyaṃ hi nāmaikasminn arthe prādhānyena pratipādye guṇaguṇibhāvam anubhavatām arthadvāreṇānyonyāpekṣiṇāṃ sambaddhānāṃ padānāṃ samūha ucyate |
GSP28durdhpru:321: tatra yadi sarveṣāṃ padārthānāṃ prādhānyaṃ syāt tadā parasparānupakārāt sambandha eva padānāṃ na syād iti vākyarūpataiva hīyeteti sūktam aneneti |
GSP28durdhpru:322: abhidheyaprayojanābhidhānam evāsya samyagjñānetyādipadasamūhātmakasya yathā tathā yasmād ityādinā kaṇṭhoktaṃ karoti |
GSP28durdhpru:324: etac ca tad vyutpādyata ity asya sāmarthyāvasthitārthakathanaṃ draṣṭavyam |
GSP28durdhpru:326: idamā ca buddhisiddhatvena tad evāṅgulīvyapadeśayogyam iva darśayati |
GSP28durdhpru:327: anena ca puruṣārthasidder upeyatvāt prādhānyam, pratipādyamānasya ca samyagjñānasya tadupāyatvād aprādhānyam |
GSP28durdhpru:328: ata eva cārthena nyāyena puruṣārthasidder vākyārthatvam |
GSP28durdhpru:329: śābdyā tu vṛttyā śiṣyasamyagjñānaviṣayā vyuptattikriyā vākyārtha iti darśitam |
GSP28durdhpru:330: nanu samyagjñānetyādinā vākyena samyagjñānasya purṣārthasiddhau hetubhāvaḥ paraṃ pradarśito na punar idaṃ tasya prayojanam iti darśitam |
GSP28durdhpru:332: tat kathaṃ yujyate? atha na (cai)tāvatāpi na jñāyate kasya kiṃ tad abhidheyaṃ kiṃ ca tasya prayojanam ity āśaṅkyāha -- atra cetyādi |
GSP28durdhpru:333: atha samyagjñānasya puruṣārthasiddhihetutvaṃ prayojanam ity avadyam |
GSP28durdhpru:335: tathā hi puruṣārthasiddhim evācāryīyaṃ samyagjñānetyādivacanaṃ prayojanam anujānāti na tu
GSP28durdhpru:336: avayavārthavyākhyāne tasya tām eva prayojanatayā vyaktīkaraṣyati |
GSP28durdhpru:337: na ca hetutvaṃ hator bhinnam iṣyate yujyate vā |
GSP28durdhpru:340: asmiṃś cārtha ucyamāne sambandhaprayojanābhidheyāni uktāni bhavanti |
GSP28durdhpru:342: na cātra prayojanaṃ prayojakaṃ vācyam, uktanyāyāt |
GSP28durdhpru:344: na ca rājaśāsanaṃ sāmānyaṃ kiñcid asti yena bhāvapradhānaḥ prayojanaśabdaḥ kalpyeta |
GSP28durdhpru:351: tato yasmāt prakaraṇābhidheyasya samyagjñānasya puruṣārthasiddhihetutvam uktam,
GSP28durdhpru:352: tasymāt prayojanam uktam iti dvir āvartanīyam |
GSP28durdhpru:354: samyagjñānasya tāṃ prati hetutvoktau ca sā prayojanam ukteti kiṃ sākṣād vācakena padena kriyata iti bhāvaḥ etāvataiva tāvad idaṃ sādhīyate |
GSP28durdhpru:356: sarvā puruṣārthasiddhir yato hetutvāt tat sarvapuruṣārthasiddhi,
GSP28durdhpru:357: tathāvidhaṃ hetutvaṃ yatra prayojanaṃ tat tathā |
GSP28durdhpru:360: kasya tādṛśam ity apekṣāyām idam uktam -- prakaraṇābhidheyasya samyagjñānasyeti kecit pratipadyante
GSP28durdhpru:362: prayojanam asyāstīti matvarthīyamataṃ vidhāya pradhānavan nirdeśaṃ vivakṣitvā prayojanavattvam iti pratijānate |
GSP28durdhpru:364: -- yata eva puruṣārthasiddhiḥ samyagjñānasādhyā tata eva sā prayojanam |
GSP28durdhpru:365: tasyāpi yad eva tām prati hetutvaṃ tad eva prayojanavattvam iti |
GSP28durdhpru:368: eka tu yataḥ samyagjñāne sati puruṣārthasiddhihetutvaṃ vyavasthāpyate,
GSP28durdhpru:369: tataḥ pramāṇaphalavad vyavasthāpy avyavasthāpanabhāvam āśriyedam uktaṃ tato na kiñcid avadyam iti mayante |
GSP28durdhpru:370: apare tu caśabdaṃ bhinnakramaṃ kṛtvā puruṣārthasiddhihetutvam uktam,
GSP28durdhpru:372: itare tu puruṣārthasiddhihetuśabdena kāraṇe kāryam upacarya puruṣārthasiddhim evābhidadhati
GSP28durdhpru:374: kecit tu nibandhakṛtaḥ kathañcid apīdaṃ samarthayitum anīśānāḥ sahitaśabdapātāt pramādapāṭhā eveti varṇayanti |
GSP28durdhpru:377: yathā pravṛtty aṅgatayā abhidheyaprayojanam ucyate, tadvat sambadhādikam api kiṃ nocyata ity āha -- asmiṃś ceti |
GSP28durdhpru:380: tathā hi prurṣārthopayogi samyagjñānaṃ vyutpādayitavyam anena prakareṇeti bruvatā samyagjñānam asya śabdasandarbhasya abhidheyam, tadvyutpādanaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:381: prayojanam, prakaraṇam ca idam apāyo vyutpādanasya ity uktam bhavati |
GSP28durdhpru:383: na tv idam ekaṃ vākyaṃ sambandham, abhidheyam, prayojanaṃ ca vaktuṃ sākṣāt samartham |
GSP28durdhpru:384: ekaṃ tu vadat trayaṃ sāmarthyāt darśayati |
GSP28durdhpru:385: tatra kathaṃ punar anyasyoktānyad uktaṃ bhavatīty āha -- tathā hi iti |
GSP28durdhpru:386: nipātasamudāyaś cāyaṃ yasmād ity asyārthe sarvatra varttate |
GSP28durdhpru:390: evaṃ sati kiṃ siddham ity āha -- tasmād iti |
GSP28durdhpru:397: athābhidheyaprayojanaṃ yathā vākyena sākṣād ucyate, tathā sambandhādīny api kiṃ nocyanta ity āha -- na tv iti |
GSP28durdhpru:399: ayam āśayaḥ -- yadi sarve padārthāḥ prādhānyam aśnuvīran, vākyam eva tadā
GSP28durdhpru:401: tato vākyam ekārtham abhidheyatayā upādātuṃ kalpyate nānekam |
GSP28durdhpru:402: yadi sākṣān na samartham, kathaṃ nāsamartham? athāsamartham eva |
GSP28durdhpru:403: na sākṣāt samartham iti tarhi na vācyam iti |
GSP28durdhpru:409: ata evoktānī viktānīti tathā 'samābhir vyākhyātam, nayathā tad anena virudhyeta |
GSP28durdhpru:410: nanu yadi nāmābhidheyādikaṃ vākyasya prakāśyam, nābhidheyam, tahāpi padārthena tenāvaśyaṃ bhāvyam |
GSP28durdhpru:411: tathā ca kasya kiṃ vādakaṃ padam ity āśaṅky āha -- tatra ityādi -- teśu abhidheyādiṣū |
GSP28durdhpru:415: prayojanaṃ ca atra vaktuḥ prakaraṇakaraṇavyāpārasya cintyate, śrotuś ca śravaṇavyāpārasya
GSP28durdhpru:416: tathā hi -- sarve prekṣāvantaḥ pravṛttiprayojanam anviṣya pravartante |
GSP28durdhpru:417: tataśa ca ācāryeṇa prakaraṇaṃ kim arthaṃ kṛtam, śrotṛbhiś ca kim artham śruyata iti saṃśaye vyutpādanaṃ prayojanābhidhīyate |
GSP28durdhpru:418: samyagjñānaṃ vyutpadyamānānām ātmānaṃ vyutpādakaṃ kartuṃ prakaraṇam idam kṛtam |
GSP28durdhpru:419: śiṣyaiś ca ācāryaprayuktām ātmano vyutpattim icchadbhiḥ prakaraṇam idaṃ śruyata iti prakaraṇakaraṇaśravaṇayoḥ prayojanaṃ vyutpādanam |
GSP28durdhpru:421: yato vyutpādyata ity atra lakāraḥ prayojyakarmaṇi vihito na prayojyakriyākarmaṇīti |
GSP28durdhpru:422: vākye 'pi loke padyate gamyate 'nenārtha iti vyutpattyā padaprayogo dṛśyate |
GSP28durdhpru:423: tato vyutpādyata iti prayojanapadam ity āha |
GSP28durdhpru:425: yad vā vyutpādyata ity atreti draṣṭavyam |
GSP28durdhpru:428: kathaṃ ca tad anyatocyata ity āha -- prayojanaṃ cātra iti |
GSP28durdhpru:430: tad ayam arthaḥ -- noktaṃ prayojanam iti cintyate kiṃ tu guṇabhūtārthaprayojakapadasya vyutpādyata ity asya prayojanam |
GSP28durdhpru:431: tadvyutpattiḥ kriyata iti ṇicaḥ kiṃ prayojanam iti praśne tasya prayojanaṃ cintyata iti yāvat
GSP28durdhpru:433: nanu kasmād iyam āśaṅkā -- `vaktrā kimarthaṃ krityate, śrotṛbhiś ca kimarthaṃ śrūyata' iti |
GSP28durdhpru:434: tau khalv evam eva pravartteyātām ity āśaṅkyāha
GSP28durdhpru:436: atha katham ubhayor vyutpādanaṃ prayojanam ucyatge? yady ato vyutpadyate
GSP28durdhpru:438: yas tu vyutpādayati tasya vyutpādanam iti |
GSP28durdhpru:440: prayojakavyāpāravatī hi vyutpattiḥ prayojanam iṣṭety ubhayor vyutpādanam eva prajyojanam |
GSP28durdhpru:443: kathaṃ nāma madvyāpāravaśena śrotṛsantānavarttinī vyutpattir bhūyād iti ācāryaḥ pravarttate
GSP28durdhpru:444: ata eva svaprayojakavyāpārādhiṣṭḥitā śrotṛsantānavārttinī vyutpattḥ karttuḥ prayojanam |
GSP28durdhpru:448: ata evācāryavyāpārādhiṣṭḥitā vyatpattiḥ śrotur api prayojanam |
GSP28durdhpru:453: prekṣāvatā hi samyagjñānāv avyutpādanāya prakaraṇam idam ārabdhavatā ayam eva upāyo na anyaḥ iti darśita eva upāyopeyabhāvaḥ prakaraṇaprayojanayoḥ sambandha iti |
GSP28durdhpru:455: tato vyutpādanaṃ prayojakavyāpāravaśavarttinī vyuptattir dvoyor api prayojanam iti itiśabdaṃ hetupadaṃ kṛtopasaṃharann āha --
GSP28durdhpru:457: nanu ca ṇici kṛte vyutpādanaṃ katham ubhayoḥ prayojanam, ittham iti [6a]
GSP28durdhpru:460: samyagjñānavyutpattau kathañcin nimittamātrāt dadhibhojanāder ācāryasyāsādhāraṇakāraṇatāpratipattiḥ prayojanam |
GSP28durdhpru:461: ayam arthaḥ -- asti paryojakavyāpārapradarśane samyagjñānavyutpattāv upayogitvamātreṇa svāsthyādinā sāmyam ācāryasya darśitaṃ syāt |
GSP28durdhpru:463: sa kathāṃ nāma pratīyeteti ṇicā nirdeśaḥ kṛta iti |
GSP28durdhpru:464: atha bhojanādes tadvyutpattau sākṣād vyāpārā 'sambhavād ācāryavyāpāraḥ pratipatsyata iti cet
GSP28durdhpru:466: evaṃ hi vyākhyātṝṇām idaṃ pratipādanakauśalaṃ syān na karttur iti nyāyyo ṇicā nirdeśaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:467: nanūktam -- abhidhānasya prayojanaṃ na nirūpyata iti |
GSP28durdhpru:468: tat kim idānīṃ tad eva vyājāntareṇa nirūpyate? satyam |
GSP28durdhpru:469: kevalaṃ vākyārthatvena na nirūpyata ity abhisandhinā` `tan na nirūpyate' ity uktam |
GSP28durdhpru:471: samyagjñānaṃ vyutpadyamānām ity asādhur ayaṃ śabdaḥ -- `vyutpattyarthasya
GSP28durdhpru:473: tan nātiśliṣṭam, jñānārthasya padeḥ sakarmakasya `vyutpannaḥ saṅketaḥ' ityādau bahuśaḥ prayogadarśanāt
GSP28durdhpru:475: mano 'vyu(-mano vyu)tpannasaṃkentam asti tena sa cen mata[PV II 143]iti |
GSP28durdhpru:476: yady abhidheyādyaḥ padārthāḥ, sambandhas tarhi kasya padasyārtha ity āha
GSP28durdhpru:481: kathaṃ sāmarthyād ity āha -- prekṣāvatā iti |
GSP28durdhpru:489: anarthāśaṅkopasthāpitānyayoganirāse tu karttavye sāmarthyagamyam avadhāraṇāntaraṃ kāryam |
GSP28durdhpru:491: nānya iti ca nānya evety avaseyam |
GSP28durdhpru:493: nanu ca prakaraṇaśravaṇāt prāg uktāny api abhidheyādīni pramāṇābhāvāt prekṣāvadbhir na grahyante
GSP28durdhpru:496: aśruyate prakaraṇe kathitāny api na niścīyante |
GSP28durdhpru:497: ukteṣu tv apramānakeśv apy abhidheyādiśu saṃśaya utpadyate |
GSP28durdhpru:500: evaṃrūpasya sambandho vyutpādyata iti prayojanābhidhānād eva darśatam |
GSP28durdhpru:505: taduktyantargatas tasmād bhinno noktaḥ prayojanād ||” [ślokavā- 1,18] iti abhidheyādiprakāśanadvāreṇādivākyaṃ pravarttakam iti asahamāna āha -- nanu ca iti |
GSP28durdhpru:506: nipātasamudāyaś cāyaṃ `codayāmi', `abhimukho bhava' ity asyārthasya dyotakaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:507: śravaṇānantaraṃ teṣāṃ prākśabdāśrayeṇa pravarttamānam anumānam anyad vā śabdasyārthanāntarīyatāyāṃ pravarttayitum arhati |
GSP28durdhpru:510: ācāryasya cāptabhāvo durbodho yenāptopadeśatayā śabdo 'rthatathātvaṃ pratyāyayed iti |
GSP28durdhpru:515: yadi satyam idaṃ kimarthaṃ tarhi [6b] te kathyanta iti? ukteṣu iti |
GSP28durdhpru:517: anenaitad āha -- sādhakabādhakapramāṇābhāve yena rte vyāhārāt pratiniyatādhikaraṇo yauktaḥ saṃayo bhavitum arhatīti |
GSP28durdhpru:518: api nyāyataḥ sambhāvanāṃ darśayati, atiśayaṃ vā |
GSP28durdhpru:519: anyathā kiṃ sapramāṇakeṣv api saṃśayo jāyate yenāpiśrutiḥ samgacchet |
GSP28durdhpru:520: nanu pravṛttiphalam ādivākyaṃ, pravṛttiś cen nāsti kiṃ saṃśayenotpāditenāpīty āha -- śaṃśayāc ca iti |
GSP28durdhpru:522: atha ye tāvan madāḥ śraddhayā vā ''cāryam upasannās te tadvacanād arthaṃ niścityaiva pravarttamānā na saṃśayāt pravarttante |
GSP28durdhpru:523: ye 'pi tadviparītāḥ saṃśerate teṣām api na śaṃśayāt pravṛttiḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:524: pravṛttau vā prekṣāvattvahānir ity āśaṅkyāha -- arthasaṃśayo 'pīti |
GSP28durdhpru:526: śakyaniścaye hi niścayam antareṇa pravarttamānāḥ prekṣāvattāyā hīyeran |
GSP28durdhpru:529: yadi ca yuktyā dvitīyākārānupraveśena saṃśayānasya na kvacit pravṛttiḥ, tarhi na kasyacid vacanāt kvacit pravarttitavyam iti bhūyān vyavahāro vilupyeta |
GSP28durdhpru:538: anarthasaṃśayo 'pi nivṛttyaṅgam ata eva śāstrakāreṇa eva pūrvam
GSP28durdhpru:540: vyākhyātṝṇāṃ hi vacanaṃ krīḍādyartham anyathā api sambhāvyate |
GSP28durdhpru:541: śāstrakṛtāṃ tu prakaraṇaprārambhe na viparītābhidheyādyabhidhāne prayojanam utpaśyāmo na api pravṛttim |
GSP28durdhpru:543: anukteṣu tu pratipatṛbhir niṣprayojanam abhidheyaṃ sambhāvyeta asya prakaraṇasya kākadantaparīkṣāyā iva, aśakyānuṣṭhānaṃ vā jvaraharatakṣakacūḍāratnālaṅkāropadeśavat, anabhimataṃ vā prayojanaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:544: mātṛvivāhakramopadeśavat, ato vā prakaraṇāt laghutara upāyaḥ prayojanasya,
GSP28durdhpru:548: yady avaśyaṃ vaktavyānyabhidheyādīni tarhi vyākhyātāra eva tāni vakṣyanti |
GSP28durdhpru:549: tat kiṃ śāstrakṛto vyāhāreṇetiy āha -- śāstrakāreṇaiva na vyākhyātṛbhiḥ
GSP28durdhpru:551: abhidheyādyanabhidhāne tu pravṛtter evāsambhavāt kathaṃ sambhavino vyākhyātāro yenāśaṅkya teṣāṃ vyāhāram ayaṃ nirasyatīti |
GSP28durdhpru:554: kenacin na karttavyam eveti codyaṃ pravṛttam, kin tv ādivākyaṃ tadarthaṃ na karttavyam ity abhisandhinā |
GSP28durdhpru:555: tatra ye tāvat sākṣād ācāryopasannās teṣāṃ tadvacanād eva tatpratītau pravṛttijñānayoḥ sambhavāt sambhavi vyākhyātṛtvam |
GSP28durdhpru:556: tebhyo 'pi tad upasannānām iti kim avadyam?
GSP28durdhpru:557: nanu ca na śāstrakṛdvacanam api prasahya pravarttayati, kiṃ tarhi prayojanādyabhidhānena pravṛttiviṣayopadarśanāt |
GSP28durdhpru:559: 'pi sambhavatīti kim ucyate śāstrakāreṇaivety ata āha -- vyākhyātṝṇāṃ hi iti |
GSP28durdhpru:561: śāstrakāreṣv apīdaṃ samānam ity āha -- śāstrakṛtām iti |
GSP28durdhpru:563: viparītaṃ ca tad abhidheyādyabhidhānaṃ ceti vigraḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:564: atha vā viparītaṃ ca tadasatyatvād abhidheyañ cābhidheyatayā prakāśanāt |
GSP28durdhpru:567: anenaitad āha -- teṣām api tathābhidhāne kim asmākaṃ bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ? kevalam eṣāṃ mahīyasāśayena śāstraṃ praṇetum icchatāṃ parārthapravṛttānāṃ naitat sambhāvayāma iti |
GSP28durdhpru:569: etac ca prayojanādyabhidhānaniyatasannidher yathābhūtārthacintāvidhānaviṣayasya kālasya nirdeśo na tu prakaraṇasya
GSP28durdhpru:570: [7a] madhe 'vasāne vā tat sambhavati saprayojanaṃ ceti |
GSP28durdhpru:572: etāsu ca anarthasambhāvanāsv ekasyām apy anarthasambhāvanāyāṃ na prekṣāvantaḥ pravartante
GSP28durdhpru:573: atha yady evaṃvidhā pravṛttiḥ śāstrakṛtāṃ dṛśyate, tvayāpy asya kiṃ na sambhāvyata ity āha -- nāpi iti |

GSP28durdhpru:1025: yatkālāś ca santi tatkālā na dṛśyante |
GSP28durdhpru:1028: tasmāt svapne keṣāñcid anubhūtānāṃ atyantam abhāvād arthakriyāyā nāsti sattvam |
GSP28durdhpru:1029: kecit tu arthakriyākāritayā abhimatāh saty asvapne viṣayā dṛṣṭakālabhedavyabhicāriṇo na santy eveti prakaraṇārthaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:1030: idam īdṛgviśiṣṭaṃ svapnajñānam udāharato dharmottarasyāyam āśayaḥ --
GSP28durdhpru:1031: evaṃvidhasya svapnajñāṇasya sadarthatvābhimānaḥ keṣāñcit satyasvapnavādinām astīti tad abhimānaśamanāyedaṃ mayodāharaṇīkṛtam |
GSP28durdhpru:1032: na tv asmād anyasya svapnajñānasya kaśicd viśeṣaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:1034: idānīṃ `paricchidyamānasya yatkālaṃ paricchedanaṃ tatkālam eva prāpyamāṇasya ^ prāpaṇaṃ abhimatam' -- evaṃ bruvata iti matvā
GSP28durdhpru:1036: deśe niyatam ākāre niyataṃ ca śakyaṃ prāpayitum ity abhidadhāno 'nayor avipratipattim āha
GSP28durdhpru:1037: idaṃ tu na sambhāvyata ity āha -- yatkālaṃ tu -- iti |
GSP28durdhpru:1040: yaḥ kālo sya paricchedanasya tad yathā bhavati tathā paricchinnam |
GSP28durdhpru:1041: sa kālo yasya prāpaṇasya tad yathā bhavati |
GSP28durdhpru:1043: yasmin kāle paricchinnam tasmin kāle na śakyate prāpayitum ity arthaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:1045: kālāntaragrāhīti yad uktaṃ tad ayuktam iti darśitam |
GSP28durdhpru:1050: samyagjñānam pūrvaṃ kāraṇaṃ yasyāḥ sā tathā uktā |
GSP28durdhpru:1051: kāryāt pūrvaṃ bhavat kāraṇaṃ pūrvam uktam |
GSP28durdhpru:1055: tat kiṃ tvayaivaṃ nocyata iti pārśvasthaṃ praty asyaivābhiprāyaṃ prakāśayati -- anyo hi -- iti |
GSP28durdhpru:1057: yady evaṃ nocyate tarhi kiṃ nāmocyata ity āha -- kin tu -- iti |
GSP28durdhpru:1060: na hi yad eva paricchinnam ity asti yenaivam ucyate |
GSP28durdhpru:1061: yatkālaṃ tu prariccchinnaṃ tatkālam iti tu yuktaṃ vaktum, na tad eveti |
GSP28durdhpru:1064: yatkālam ity anena hi takālam iti prāptam, tad eveti tacchabdena vastuviṣayo yacchabda ākṛṣyate |
GSP28durdhpru:1065: tato 'yam arthaḥ -- yatkālaṃ paricchinnaṃ yad vastu takālaṃ tad
GSP28durdhpru:1068: evaṃ khalu vākyaṃ syāt samarthitam, pūrvapakṣāt punar asyāviśeṣaḥ prāptaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:1069: asti viśeṣo mahān, kevalaṃ bhavatā na samīcīnaṃ nirūpitaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:1070: tathā hi pūrvapakṣāvasthāyāṃ yatkālaṃ tatkālaṃ iti cātra bahuvrīhiṇā paricchedanalakṣaṇā prāpaṇalakṣaṇā ca kriyā 'bhidhīyate |
GSP28durdhpru:1072: yad vastu yena kālena sambaddhaṃ paricchinnaṃ tad eva tena kālena sambaddhaṃ svarūpeṇa prāpaṇīyaṃ tadā 'nyadā vā |
GSP28durdhpru:1073: paricchedasya yādṛśaḥ kālas tasmin kāle yad vidyamānaṃ tad eva prāpaṇīyam iti yāvat |
GSP28durdhpru:1074: tataś ca paricchedakā[12b]lā 'sato yad grāhakaṃ tan na pramāṇam ity avatiṣṭhate |
GSP28durdhpru:1075: nocyate yasmin kāla ityādinā ca yad etad uktaṃ tad bāhyaprāpaṇābhiprāyeṇa draṣṭavyam |
GSP28durdhpru:1076: paramārthatas tu jñānasya pradarśanād anyaḥ prānapaṇāvyāpāro nāstīti yasminn eva kāle paricchidyate 'rthas tasminn eva kāle prāpyata iti |
GSP28durdhpru:1077: etac cānantaram evānenaiva vistareṇa pratipāditam iti svavacanavyāghāto 'nyathā 'sya syād iti |
GSP28durdhpru:1078: nanv evam api paricchedakālavarttinaḥ prāpaṇaṃ na sambhavaty eva |
GSP28durdhpru:1080: tathā copadarśitārthaprāpakatvaṃ nāma kasyacid api jñānasya nāstīty asambhavitaiva samyagjñānatvalakṣanasya syād ity āśaṅkyāha -- abhedeti |
GSP28durdhpru:1083: ayam asya bhāvaḥ -- sāṃvyavahārikasyeha pramāṇasya lakṣaṇām ucyate |
GSP28durdhpru:1085: tatra yady api vastusthityā paricchinnaprāpyayor nānātvaṃ tathāpi vyavaharttāro nirantarāparāparotpatter avidyāvaśāc ca hetuphalarūpaṃ kṣaṇapracayaṃ tad evedam ity ekatvenādhimuñcanti tataḥ paricchedakālabhāvinaḥ prāpaṇaṃ sambhavaty eva |
GSP28durdhpru:1087: tad anena prabandhena samayagjñanapadaṃ vyākhyāyādhunā pūrvaśabdaṃ vyācikhyāsus tena sādharmasya vigraham āha -- samyagjñānam iti |
GSP28durdhpru:1089: dvividhaṃ ca samyagjñānam arthakriyānirbhāsam, arthakriyāsamarthe ca pravartakam |
GSP28durdhpru:1090: tayor madhya yat pravartakam, tad iha parīkṣyate. tac ca pūrvamātram. na tu sākṣātkāraṇam. samyagjñāne hi sati pūrvadṛṣṭasmaraṇam,
GSP28durdhpru:1091: smaraṇād abhilāṣaḥ, abhilāṣāt pravṛttiḥ, pravṛtteś ca prāptiḥ. tato na sākṣāthetuḥ.
GSP28durdhpru:1093: tathā ca samyagjñānakāraṇiketi vaktum ucitaṃ tatkim evam uktam ity āha -- kāryād iti |
GSP28durdhpru:1094: anena vyavasthāvācī sann eva pūrvaśabdaḥ kāraṇe varttata iti darśayati |
GSP28durdhpru:1095: bhavad iti `lakṣaṇahetvoḥ kriyāyāḥ' [pāṇini 3.2.126] iti hetau śatur
GSP28durdhpru:1097: yady evaṃ kāraṇaśabda eva kriyatām ity āha --
GSP28durdhpru:1099: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ -- karotīti kāraṇam ucyate, na tv akurvad rūpam |
GSP28durdhpru:1101: na ca mukhye sambhavati amukhye pratyayo yujyate |
GSP28durdhpru:1102: tato yad eva jñānam avyavadhānena puruṣārthasiddher nibandhanam, tad eva kāraṇaśabdena
GSP28durdhpru:1103: pratīyeteti. yadi pūrvagrahaṇe 'py evaṃ pratyayas tadā ko viśeṣa ity āha
GSP28durdhpru:1105: tuḥ kāraṇaśabdād viśeṣam asyāha -- pūrvamātram iti sākṣātkāraṇam itaraś ca |
GSP28durdhpru:1107: na caivam asti, sarvasyaiva puruṣārthasiddhiṃ prati
GSP28durdhpru:1108: sākṣātkāraṇatvād ity āha -- dvividhaṃ ca -- iti |
GSP28durdhpru:1110: kathaṃ dvaividhyam ity āha -- arthakriyeti. nirbhāsate 'sminn iti nirbhāsaḥ.
GSP28durdhpru:1111: arthakriyāyā nirbhāso yasmāt tat tathā. yataḥ sādhanajñānād anantaraṃ
GSP28durdhpru:1113: kecit tu kṣaṇena kāryakāraṇāvyavahārasyārvāgdarśanena karttum aśakyatvād dāhādipratibhāsam eva jñānam evaṃ bruvate |
GSP28durdhpru:1119: anyoḥ kiṃ parīkṣyata ity āha tayoḥ
GSP28durdhpru:1121: pravarttakam api sākṣātkāraṇaṃ tat ko 'nyatra vidveṣo yenedam eva
GSP28durdhpru:1122: vicāryate? kiṃ vā pūrvaśabdenety āha -- tac ca iti. co yasmāt.
GSP28durdhpru:1123: ayam āśayaḥ -- yataḥ pravarttante tat sarvam arthaprāpter vyavahitaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:1125: ataś ca sambhavat pratibandhaṃ tat pravṛttyaṅgatvāt pūrvamātram,
GSP28durdhpru:1128: amum eva draḍhyann āha -- na tu -- iti |
GSP28durdhpru:1136: tataḥ pravṛttiḥ pravarttakajñānopadarśitam arthaṃ prāptukāmā vyāpārasahāyā buddhiḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:1138: yasmāt smaraṇādinā vyavadhānaṃ tataḥ tasmāt na sākṣāṭ hetuḥ prāpter upāyaḥ puruṣārthasidder iti prakaraṇāt |
GSP28durdhpru:1140: arthakriyānirbhāsāṃ[24]tu yady api sākṣātprāptiḥ, tathā api tan na
GSP28durdhpru:1141: parīkṣaṇīyam. yatra eva hi prekṣāvanto 'rthinaḥ sāśaṅkāḥ, tat parīkṣyate.
GSP28durdhpru:1142: arthakriyānirbhāse ca jñāne sati siddhaḥ puruṣārthaḥ. tena tatra na
GSP28durdhpru:1143: sāśaṅkā arthinaḥ. atas tan na parīkṣaṇīyam. tasmāt parīkṣārham asākṣātkāraṇaṃ samyagjñānam ādarśayituṃ kāraṇaśabdaṃ parityajya pūrvagrahaṇaṃ kṛtam.
GSP28durdhpru:1146: yadi paramparayā 'pi prāptihetuḥ parīkṣyate tarhi sākṣāt hetur atitarāṃ
GSP28durdhpru:1149: yada prāptihetur iti pāṭhas tadā arthakriyānirbhāsam ity asyāntyavyākhyānapakṣe bhinnā santoṣādiprāptir lokādhyavasāyasiddhā yā tasyā hetuḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:1153: kasmāt tat na parīkṣyata ity āha -- yatraiva hi -- iti |
GSP28durdhpru:1157: evaṃ bruvataś cāyam āśayaḥ -- na vyasanam etac chāstrakṛto yena jñānam
GSP28durdhpru:1162: tato yatraiva te tathāpravṛttayas tad eva parīkṣyata iti |
GSP28durdhpru:1166: kuto na tathāvṛttayaḥ? yena sākṣātkāraṇe 'smin sati siddhaḥ puruṣārtaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:1167: tenānantaram eva phalasyānubhūyamānatvāt, tad eva santoṣādigamanād vā |
GSP28durdhpru:1168: vyākhyānadvaye 'pi arthakriyānirbhāsaśabdavācyadvaye sthite dvayam etat śaṅkāyāḥ kāraṇam --
GSP28durdhpru:1170: tadabhābe tu kathaṃ śaṅkerann iti bhāvaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:1171: mā bhūvaṃs tatra sāśaṅkās tat kiṃ siddham ity āha-- ata iti |
GSP28durdhpru:1172: yadi vyavahitaṃ pravarttakaṃ puruṣārthasiddher na kāraṇaṃ tarhi katham uktam -- `kāryāt pūrvaṃ bhavat kāraṇaṃ pūrvam uktam' iti? asākṣātkāraṇe cākāraṇe kāraṇa[13b]viśeṣaṇaṃ sākṣād iti nirarthakam ity āśaṅkyāha --
GSP28durdhpru:1174: yasmāt sākṣātkāraṇam āśaṅkānāspadaṃ sad aparīkṣaṇīyaṃ tasmād yad asākṣātkāraṇam ata eva ca parīkṣārhaṃ parīkṣkṣāyogyaṃ pravarttakaṃ samyagjñānam ādarśayitum ādarśayiṣyāmi -- iti kāraṇaśabdaṃ vihāya
GSP28durdhpru:1176: etad uktaṃ bhavati -- yo 'yaṃ kāraṇaśabdo vyavahite kāraṇakāraṇe varttate nāyaṃ tatrābhidhāyakatvena varttate karotīti kāraṇam iti vyutpatteḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:1180: puruṣasya arthaḥ puruṣārthaḥ. arthyata ity arthaḥ kāmyata iti yāvat. heyo
GSP28durdhpru:1181: 'rtha upādeyo vā. heyo hy artho hāntum iṣyate, upādeyo 'pi upādātum. na ca heyopādeyābhyām anyo rāśir asti. upekṣaṇīyo hy anupādeyatvāt heya eva.
GSP28durdhpru:1182: tasya siddhiḥ hānam upādānaṃ ca. hetunibandhanā hi siddhir utpattir
GSP28durdhpru:1183: ucyate, jñānanibandhanā tu siddhir anuṣṭhānam. heyasya ca hānam
GSP28durdhpru:1184: anuṣṭhānam, upādeyasya ca upādānam. tato heyopadeyayor hānopādānalakṣaṇānuṣṭhitiḥ siddhir ity ucyate.
GSP28durdhpru:1185: syād etat -- saty api kāraṇagrahaṇe vicārārham eva samyagjñāṇaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:1187: yatas tad vyutpādyata ity arthaḥ, sādhyatvāt |
GSP28durdhpru:1189: tena pradhānānurodhāt tacchabdo varṇitayā nītyā mukhyasya kāraṇasya samyagjñānasya vyutpattikarmatā'nupapattes tatparityāgena lakṣaṇayā tādarthyabhūtayā pratyāsattyā 'rthakriyāsamarthapravarttaka eva pravarttiṣyate |
GSP28durdhpru:1190: yathā mañcāḥ krośantīty atra pradhānānurodhāt mañcaśabdaḥ krośanakriyākarttṛtvānupapatteṛ mukhyam arthaṃ tyaktvā lakṣaṇayā tātsthyabhūtayā pratyāsattyā puruṣeṣu varttata iti |
GSP28durdhpru:1192: kevalam evaṃ sati vyākhyātṝṇām idaṃ kauśalaṃ syān na śāstrakṛta iti sarvam anavadyam |
GSP28durdhpru:1193: idānīṃ puruṣārthasiddipadaṃ vivariṣuḥ puruṣaśabdena sārdham arthaśabdasya
GSP28durdhpru:1194: vigraham, arthasya ca svarūpaṃ puruṣasyetyādinā cāṣṭe |
GSP28durdhpru:1195: arthyata ity ācakṣāṇo[25]`artha yācñāyām' ity ato ṇijantāt karmaṇyacaṃ darśayati |
GSP28durdhpru:1196: arthyata ity asyārthaṃ spaṣṭayati -- kāmyata iṣyata ity anena yāvān evārthaṃ uktas tāvān evārthyata ity anenāpīti iti yāvad ity asyārthaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:1201: ko 'sāv arthaṃ ity āha -- heya iti |
GSP28durdhpru:1204: na tarhi heyo 'rtha ity āha -- heya iti |
GSP28durdhpru:1206: heyo hātuṃ tyaktum iṣyate tasmād arthaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:1208: atra yady api svīkaraṇecchā nāsti tathāpi parihārecchā tāvad astīti |
GSP28durdhpru:1209: yadi hātum iṣyamāṇo 'rthaḥ katham upādeyo 'rtha ity āha --
GSP28durdhpru:1211: na kevalaṃ heya iṣyate ity apiśabdaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:1212: nanu ca na heyopādeyāv artho 'pi tv anyo 'pi |
GSP28durdhpru:1213: tataḥ so 'pi kasmān na pradarśyata ity āha -- na ceti |
GSP28durdhpru:1216: yatra na pravṛttir yataś ca na nirvṛttiḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:1217: tat katham anubhavasiddhasyāpahnva ity āha -- upekṣaṇīya iti |
GSP28durdhpru:1220: tattra yady anupādeyatvād dheyas tadā 'heyatvād upādeyaḥ kiṃ na bhavati” iti |
GSP28durdhpru:1221: sādhūktaṃ tena bhadantena kevalaṃ heyaśabdārthavicāre mano na
GSP28durdhpru:1223: sarvā cāsau puruṣārthasiddhiś ceti. sarvaśabda iha dravyakārtsnye vṛttaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:1224: na tu prakārakārtsnye. tato na ayam arthaḥ -- dviprakārā api siddhiḥ
GSP28durdhpru:1225: samyagjñānanibandhanā eva iti. api tv ayam arthaḥ -- yā kācit siddhiḥ, sā sarvā kṛtsnā eva asau samyagjñānanibandhanā iti. mithyājñānād dhi kākatālīyāpi nāsty arthasiddhiḥ. tathā hi -- yadi pradarśitam artham
GSP28durdhpru:1229: hīyate, tyajyate, na svīkriyate iti heyaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:1232: tena ahiviṣakaṇṭakādīnām api hānaṃ tatrā [14a] 'pravṛttir eva |
GSP28durdhpru:1234: tathā ca yadi tasya svīkāro bhavet, tadā 'heyatvaṃ siddhim adhyāsīta |
GSP28durdhpru:1235: na ca tat svīkriyata iti vyaktam ayaṃ hetur asiddhas tasya |
GSP28durdhpru:1238: athānubhavasiddhasya tṛtīyarāśer upekṣaṇiyasyāsvīkaraṇamātrād dheyena sārdham aikyapratipādanam ayuktam iti cet |
GSP28durdhpru:1240: na hi vayam api prasiddhyor heyopekṣaṇiyayor arthayor ekasvabhāvatām ātiṣṭhāmahe
GSP28durdhpru:1242: hānaśabdenopekṣāyā abhidhānam iti kim avadyam? etac ca heyopādeyatvam
GSP28durdhpru:1244: adhunā siddhiśabdasyārthapadena vigrahaṃ bruvann artham āha -- tasya --
GSP28durdhpru:1246: nanu loke siddhir niṣpattir ucyate, yathaudanasya siddhir iti. tat katham evaṃ varṇyata ity āha -- hetunibadhaneti. hetuḥ kāraṇaṃ nibaddhyate 'sminn
GSP28durdhpru:1248: hetur nibandhanam asyā iti vigṛhya hetupratibaddhety artho vaktavyaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:1249: yadi janakanibandhanā siddhir īḍṛśī tarhi jñānanibandhanā kīdṛśī bhaviṣyatīty āha -- jñāneti
GSP28durdhpru:1250: tuḥ pūrvasyāḥ siddher asyā bhedaṃ darśayati
GSP28durdhpru:1251: | evaṃ ca vyācakṣāṇa arthapadavyākhyāne “arthaḥ prayojanaṃ dāhādi”,
GSP28durdhpru:1252: siddhipadavyākhyāne ca “tasya dāhāder niṣpattiḥ” iti yad vinītadevaśāntabhadrau vyācakṣātāṃ tad dvayam apy apāsyati |
GSP28durdhpru:1253: yataḥ svahetor eva vahnyāder dāhāder niṣpattir na tu jñānāt tasya tadakārakatvād iti |
GSP28durdhpru:1254: nanu yadi siddhir anuṣṭhānam, tarhi hānam upādānaṃ siddhir ity āha --
GSP28durdhpru:1255: heyasya ca -- iti. co hetau, avadhāraṇe vā hānam ity asmāt paro draṭavyaḥ.
GSP28durdhpru:1257: kim evaṃ sati siddham ity āha -- tata iti |
GSP28durdhpru:1258: yato jñānanibandhanā siddhir īdṛśī tatas tasmāt kāraṇāt |
GSP28durdhpru:1259: puruṣārthasiddhiśabdānāṃ vigraham arthaṃ vyākhyāya samprati sarvaśabdaṃ vyākhyātuṃ vigraham āha -- sarvā ca -- iti |
GSP28durdhpru:1260: evaṃ ca vigṛhṇan yad vinītadevena vyākhyātam -- “sarvaś cāsau laukiko lokottaraś cāsannadeśo dūradeśaś ca puruṣārthaś ceti, tathā tasya siddhiḥ” iti, tad dūṣayati.
GSP28durdhpru:1263: pradarśitaṃ ca prāpayat samyagjñānam eva. pradarśitaṃ ca aprāpayat
GSP28durdhpru:1264: mithyājñānam. aprāpakaṃ ca katham arthasiddhinibandhanaṃ syāt. tasmād yan mithyājñānam, na tato arthasiddhiḥ. yataś ca arthasiddhiḥ, tat samyagjñānam eva. ata eva samyagjñānam yatnato vyutpādanīyam. yatas tad eva puruṣārthasiddhinibandhanam,
GSP28durdhpru:1265: vyākhyāyamāne sarvaśabdena puruṣārthasiddher aviśeṣaṇād mithyājñānāt kākatālīyārthasiddhir nivāritā syāt |
GSP28durdhpru:1269: yo 'pi śāntabhadraḥ “sarvaś cāsau puruṣārthaś ca, sarveṣāṃ vā puruṣāṇām
GSP28durdhpru:1270: arthas tasya siddhiḥ” iti vyācaṣṭe, so 'py anayaiva dvārā nirākṛtaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:1271: nanu sarvaśabdasya prakārakātsnaryavṛtter api darśanān na jñāyate kiṃ vṛttir atrābhipreta ity āha -- sarvaśabda iti. dravyasya niḥśeṣatāyāṃ vṛttaḥ pravṛtto vācakabhāvena |
GSP28durdhpru:1274: dravyaśabdena cedaṃ tad iti vyapadeśayogyaṃ grahītavyam |
GSP28durdhpru:1278: dravyam ity ucyate so 'rtho bhedyatva vivakṣitaḥ” iti puruṣārthasiddhir apīdaṃ tad iti vyapadeśayogyā

GSP28durdhpru:2676: tat katham ātmanaivātmanaḥ saṃvedanam iti cet |
GSP28durdhpru:2678: asti jñānasya sā yogyatā jaḍavyāvṛttatā jyotīrūpatā yayā svaprakāśe prakāśāntaraṃ nāpekṣate
GSP28durdhpru:2679: yathā pradīpaḥ prakāśasvābhāvyād ātmānaṃ svayam eva prakāśayte, na tu pradīpāntaram apekṣata iti |
GSP28durdhpru:2680: nanu kiṃ ghaḍādidṛṣṭāntabalāt prakāśāntaraprakāśyatā jñānasyāstām, āhosvit pradīpadṛṣṭāntasāmarthyāt prakāśāntaranirapekṣatayā svaprakāśatā?
GSP28durdhpru:2683: atra ca prayogaḥ -- yad avyaktavyaktikaṃ na tad vyaktam yathā kiñcit kadācit kathañcid

GSP28durdhpru:2686: jñānasya jñānāntareṇa vyaktau hetur ayam asiddha iti cen na, nīlajñānodayakāle 'siddhatvād hetor nīlasya parokṣatvaprasañjanāt |
GSP28durdhpru:2687: na ca bhavatām api mate sarvaṃ vijñānam ekārthasamavāyinā jñānena jñāyate |
GSP28durdhpru:2690: tat upekṣaṇīyam eva tāvad avyaktavyaktikatvād avyaktaṃ prasajyeta |

GSP28durdhpru:2694: na ca gṛhyamāṇākāro nīlādiḥ sātarūpo vedyate iti śakyaṃ vaktum |

GSP28durdhpru:2696: yadi hi sātarūpo 'yam nīlādir anubhūyata iti niścīyeta, syāt tadā tasya

GSP28durdhpru:2702: tatsantāne jñānasyābhāvāt kathaṃ vastunas tathā vyavaḥāra iti cet |

GSP28durdhpru:2707: [35] paṅktibāhyaṃ likhitaṃ samyak na paṭhyate -- saṃ-
GSP28durdhpru:2708: nanu kiṃ tad rūpāntaram, yenocyate -- yenātmā saṃvedyate, tad ātmasaṃvedanaṃ pratyakṣam iti? kevalam arthaśūyam etad ucyate ity āśaṅkyāha -- ihetyādi |

GSP28durdhpru:2724: naivaṃ śakyate vaktum ity ucyate ity āha -- yadīti |

GSP28durdhpru:2731: tasmād sātānīlādyarthād anyad eva sātam anubhūyate nīlānubhavakāle |

GSP28durdhpru:2738: tat kim evam ucyate it āśaṅkya pūrvoktam eva smārayati -- yasminn iti |
GSP28durdhpru:2741: gṛhītaṃ nīlasya sātarūpatvaṃ vikalpenānugamyata evety āha -- na ceti |

GSP28durdhpru:2748: tathā ca katham ajñānena jñānātmasaṃvedanam? kathaṃ cātmavedanaṃ pratyakṣam ity āha -- tac ceti |
GSP28durdhpru:2750: jñānam evety avadhārayataḥ prakāśātmana eva jñānatvam anyathā prakāśāyogād ity abhiprāyaḥ

GSP28durdhpru:2807: ārāt pāpakebhyo dharmebhyo yātā ity āryāḥ |

GSP28durdhpru:2884: sphuṭābhaṃ bhavati, nirvikalpakaṃ tu kathaṃ yena pratyakṣaṃ syād ity āha -- sphuṭābhatvād eveti |

GSP28durdhpru:2894: bhavatu saṅketakāladṛṣṭatvasya tathātvam, kim ata ity āha -- yathā ceti |
GSP28durdhpru:2896: bhavatv evaṃ tathāpi vādakākārasaṃsargino 'pi kathaṃ na sphuṭābhatvam ity āha -- tad iti |
GSP28durdhpru:2899: | asphuṭābhaṃ tu kutas tad ity āha -- asannnihitārthagrāhitvād iti |
GSP28durdhpru:2901: pūrvavṛttadarśana viṣayatayā ca bhūtapūrvo bhāvo gṛhyamāno na sannihitarūpo bhāsate |
GSP28durdhpru:2904: asannihitaviṣayatvam eva tasya kuto 'vasīyata ity āha --
GSP28durdhpru:2906: yat pūrvadṛṣṭatvaṃ sampraty asad, asadrūpaṃ vastuno gṛhyamāṇasya gṛhṇad iti hetau śatur vidhānād asadrūpagrahaṇād ity arthaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:2907: sphuṭābhatvād eveti yad avocat, tad evopasaṃharati tata iti |
GSP28durdhpru:2908: yato vikalpasya spaṣṭābhatvaṃ na yujyate, anantaroktena krameṇa tatas tasmāt sphuṭābhatvād viśadābatvān nirvikalapakaṃ yogijñānam iti prakaraṇāt |
GSP28durdhpru:2909: prayogaḥ -- yat saṅketakāladṛṣṭatayā vastusaṃsparśi jñānaṃ na tat

GSP28durdhpru:2924: tasya caturvidhasya pratyakṣasya viṣayo boddhavyaḥ svalakṣaṇam |
GSP28durdhpru:2926: vastuno hy āsādhāraṇaṃ ca tattvam asti sāmānyaṃ ca |
GSP28durdhpru:2927: tatra yad asādhāraṇam tat pratyakṣasya grāhyam |
GSP28durdhpru:2932: na hi pūrvajñānaviṣayatvaṃ pūrvamsin nivṛtte vastuno 'sti |

GSP28durdhpru:3024: na kevalaṃ pratyakṣam anyad gṛhṇāti, anyad adhyavasyati, kin tv anumānam apy anyagrāhy anyādhyavasāyīty apiśabdenāha |

GSP28durdhpru:3542: tayor vyavasthāpyavyavasthāpanayor bhāvas tathā jñānābhidhānanimittaṃ rūpaṃ tena |

GSP28durdhpru:3556: nīlasyedaṃ nānyasyety anenākāreṇa yan nīlasaṃvedanaṃ tad rūpam |
GSP28durdhpru:3561: yato yasmān nilasadṛśam anubhūyeti vāstavaṃ rūpam anūditam |
GSP28durdhpru:3563: api tu nīlam evānubhavāmīti nīlasya grākam avasthāpyate |
GSP28durdhpru:3566: na tu nirvikalpatvāt pratyakṣam eva nīlabodharūpatvena ātmanam avasthāpayitum śaknoti |
GSP28durdhpru:3567: niścayapratyayena avyavasthāpitaṃ sad api nīlabodharūpaṃ vijñānam asatkalpam eva |
GSP28durdhpru:3568: tasmān niścayena nīlabodharūpaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ vijñānaṃ nīlabodhātmanā sad bhavati |
GSP28durdhpru:3569: tasmād adhyavasāyaṃ kurvad eva pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ bhavati |
GSP28durdhpru:3570: akṛte tv adhyavasāye nīlabodharūpatvenāvyavasthāpitaṃ bhavati vijñānam |
GSP28durdhpru:3572: ataḥ sādhakatamatvābhāvāt pramāṇam eva na syāj jñānam |
GSP28durdhpru:3577: tat kena tathā vyavasthāyata ity āha -- niścayapratyayeneti |
GSP28durdhpru:3580: tasmāt sārūpyam anubhūtaṃ svasaṃvedanena pratītaṃ vyavasthāpanahetur nīlasyedaṃ saṃvedanam, na pītasyeti niyamakaraṇasya

GSP28durdhpru:3583: yadi jñānasya tasya sārupyam evaṃ vyavasthāpanahetus tarhi kiṃ kīdṛśaṃ ca sad vyavasthāpyam ity āha -- niścayeti |
GSP28durdhpru:3587: yasyaiva nīlajñānasya sārūpyaṃ tathoktaṃ tad eva jñānaṃ vyavasthāpyaṃ nīlasyaivetyākāreṇa niyāmyam ity arthaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3591: dṛśyate kin tu tasya kutra niveśa iti na jñāyate -- saṃ-
GSP28durdhpru:3592: kīdṛśaṃ sat tathā vyavasthāpyam ity āha -- nīleti |
GSP28durdhpru:3593: pītādisaṃvedanavyāvṛttyā nīlasyedaṃ saṃvedanaṃ jñānam ity avasthāpyamānaṃ niścīyamānam |

GSP28durdhpru:3597: yasmāt sārūpyād anyavyavasthāpanahetur na ghaṭate, sārūpyaṃ ca jñānād anyaṃ nopapadyate tasmāt kāraṇāt |

GSP28durdhpru:3607: yathā marīcīr dṛṣṭvā tadbalotpannena vikalpenāvasthāpyamānayor jalasārūpyajñānayor na tathābhāvaḥ

GSP28durdhpru:3682: evaṃ pratyakṣaṃ vyākhyāya anumānaṃ vyākhyātum āha --

GSP28durdhpru:3695: aśakyatāṃ ca prakārabhedakathanam antareṇa lakṣaṇanirdeśasya jñātvā prāk prakārabhedaḥ kathyata iti |

GSP28durdhpru:3711: pratyakṣaval lakṣaṇam eva prathamam uktaṃ syād iti bhāvaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3714: nanu prativyaktiniyataṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vyaktiviśeṣopadarśanaṃ vinā na śakyate darśayitum iti vyaktibheda eva kathayitavyaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3715: tat kiṃ prakārabhedaḥ kathyata ity āha -- prakāreti |
GSP28durdhpru:3718: pratiniyatalakṣaṇākhyānaṃ na śakyaṃ tarhi kiṃ tena kathitenety āha --
GSP28durdhpru:3721: pratiśabdo 'tra niyatārthavṛttiḥ, tena prati viśiṣṭā vyaktis tatra niyatam iti,
GSP28durdhpru:3723: kim punas tad dvaividhyam ity āha --
GSP28durdhpru:3730: yad vā niyataṃ viśiṣṭaṃ lakṣaṇāṃ na śakyaṃ vaktum |
GSP28durdhpru:3736: etena yac codyate “lakṣaṇamātre kathite viśiṣṭalakṣaṇam anumānam ekam anekaṃ vā 'stu |

GSP28durdhpru:3739: atha viśiṣṭaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tad api vyaktibhedakathanam antareṇa vaktuṃ yadi śakyeta kiṃ na kathyta

GSP28durdhpru:3826: trirūpāl liṅgād iti cācakṣāṇenācāryeṇaikadvipadavyudāsena ṣaṭpakṣīṃ pratikṣipya saptamapakṣaparigraheṇa liṅgasya lakṣaṇam abhipretaṃ prakāśitam iti |
GSP28durdhpru:3827: yathā caitat tathā bhaṭṭārcaṭanibandhanam arcaṭālokasaṃjñitaṃ vidhāsyanto vistareṇa spaṣṭayiṣyāmaḥ
GSP28durdhpru:3831: trirūpaliṅgālambanam iti dhūmaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvatrāyaṃ vahnināntarīyaka iti jñānaṃ vācyam |
GSP28durdhpru:3832: tad dhi paramparayā trirūpāl liṅgāj jātam iti |
GSP28durdhpru:3835: kim punar viśiṣyata ity āha -- etac ceti |
GSP28durdhpru:3839: anumeyo dharmadharmisamudāyaḥ ālambyata ity ālambanaṃ yasyeti vigrahaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3840: itir vākyārthaparisamāptau evam arthaḥ san nāpareṇa sambaddhyate -- evam uktena pakāreṇā lakṣaṇavipratipattiṃ nirākṛtyeti ||
GSP28durdhpru:3841: nanu ca pramāṇasya phalam iti yady ācāryasya vivakṣitaṃ dharmottareṇa caivaṃ vyākhyāyate tadā pramāṇabhāgavyavasthāyāṃ kim uktam ācāryeṇa,
GSP28durdhpru:3842: dharmottareṇāpi `nīlasārūpyaṃ vyavasthāpanahetuḥ pramāṇam' ity upariṣṭāt [pṛ-91] kim iti darśayiṣyate iti cet |
GSP28durdhpru:3846: yathā hi nīlasarūpaṃ pratyakṣam anubhūyamānaṃ nīlabodharūpam
GSP28durdhpru:3848: nīlabodharūpaṃ tu vyavasthāpyamānaṃ pramāṇaphalam; tadvad anumānaṃ nīlākāram utpadyamānaṃ nīlabodharūpam avasthāpyate, tena nīlasārūpyam asya
GSP28durdhpru:3856: trairūpyaṃ punar liṅgasya anumeye sattvam eva sapakṣa eva sattvam,
GSP28durdhpru:3857: asapakṣe ca asattvam eva niścitam II-5
GSP28durdhpru:3859: liṅgasya yat trairūpyaṃ yāni trīṇi rūpāṇi tat idam ucyate iti śeṣaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3860: kiṃ punas tat trairūpyam ity āha -- anumeyaṃ vakṣyamāṇalakṣaṇam |
GSP28durdhpru:3861: tasmin liṅgasya sattvam eva niścitam -- ekaṃ rūpam |
GSP28durdhpru:3862: yady api ca atra niścitagrahaṇam na kṛtaṃ tathā api ante kṛtaṃ prakrāntayor dvayor api rūpayor apekṣaṇīyam |
GSP28durdhpru:3863: yato na yogyatayā liṅgaṃ parokṣajñānasya nimittam |
GSP28durdhpru:3864: yathā maulasya pramāṇśabdasya phalaśabdena vigraho darśitaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3867: etac copalakṣaṇaṃ tena phalasya sādhanaṃ ca yat tasyāpi yā vyavasthā sā 'pi gṛhyate |
GSP28durdhpru:3870: ata eva niścayaḥ -- “na parmāṇaphalayor viṣayabhdedaḥ” iti
GSP28durdhpru:3877: nanu saṅkhyālakṣaṇaphalavipratipattaya evānumānasya nirākṛtā, na tu viṣayavipratipattir ity āha -- evam iti |
GSP28durdhpru:3878: evam anantaroktena prakāreṇa ihānumānaparicchede nirākṛtā iti śeṣaḥ, vakṣyamāṇaṃ vā nīrākṛteti padaṃ vacanavipariṇāmena sambandhanīyam |
GSP28durdhpru:3879: traiprūyam ityādigranthasya yata utthānam, tat lakṣaṇetyādinā darśayati |
GSP28durdhpru:3880: prasaṅgena prastāv ena yāni trīṇi rūpāṇi tāny eva tathety āvedayati |
GSP28durdhpru:3881: tat idaṃ trairūpyam iti prakṛtatvāt śeṣo 'dhyāhāraḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3885: kasmāt punas tad apekṣanīyam ity āha --yata iti |
GSP28durdhpru:3888: kasmān na tathety āha -- adṛṣṭād iti |
GSP28durdhpru:3891: liṅgaṃ na parokṣajñānanimittaṃ tarhi pakṣadharmatayā jñātam evāstu parokṣaprakāśanaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:3898: tasmāt parokṣārthanāntarīyakatayā niścayanam eva liṅgasya parokṣārthapratipādanavyāpāraḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3901: 'nvayavyatirekapakṣadharmatvaniścayo liṅgavyāpārātmakatvād avaśyakartavya iti sarveṣu rūpeṣu niścitagrahaṇam apekṣaṇīyam |
GSP28durdhpru:3905: pakṣīkṛteṣu taruṣu patrasaṅkocalakṣaṇaḥ svāpa ekadeśe na siddhaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3906: na hi sarve vṛkṣā rātrau patrasaṅkocabhājaḥ kin tu kecid eva |
GSP28durdhpru:3907: sattvavacanasya tat kim anvayavyatirekaniścayena tasya? ity āśakyāha -- nāpīti |
GSP28durdhpru:3917: parokṣasya vahnyāder nāntarīyako 'vinābhāvītasya bhāvas tattā tayā
GSP28durdhpru:3921: evakāreṇa vyavacchinnam evānyasya tad vyāpārārarūpatvaṃ spaṣṭārthaṃ nāpara ity anenānūditam
GSP28durdhpru:3922: yat punar atrāpy ayam etan nāntarīyaka iti jñāṇaṃ tad anumānajñānam iti jñeyam |
GSP28durdhpru:3924: ataḥ sattvenāniścitāl liṅgād aniścitasambandhāc cāpratipatteḥ kāraṇād anvayādiniściyo 'vaśyakarttavyaḥ
GSP28durdhpru:3925: tathāpi kathaṃ karttaya ity āśaṅkya vyatirekamukheṇoktam eva hetum anvyayamukhenāpi darśayann āha -- liṅgeti |
GSP28durdhpru:3926: liṅgavyāpārasya parokṣapratipādane gamakavyāpārasyātmā sa eva tatheti svārthikaḥ kan karttavyaḥ
GSP28durdhpru:3927: tasya bhāvas tasmād iti hetupadaṃ kṛṭvā 'yam upasaṃhāraḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3929: sampraty ekaikasya rūpasya yad vyāvarttyaṃ tat krameṇa darśayitum āha --
GSP28durdhpru:3936: athāpi syāt svāpavat dhūmo 'py ayam ekadeśāsiddha eva |
GSP28durdhpru:3937: tathā hi parvatādir iha pakṣas tatra ca kvacid eva deśe siddho na sarvatra |
GSP28durdhpru:3939: athaivaṃvidho 'pi pakṣavyāpaka ucyate tarhi svāpena kim aparāddhaṃ yenāsāv evaiko na yukta iti |
GSP28durdhpru:3941: paścāt kṛtena evakāreṇa asādhāraṇo dharmo nirastaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3942: yadi hi anumeya eva sattvam iti kuryāt śrāvaṇatvam eva hetuḥ syāt |
GSP28durdhpru:3945: tasminn eva sattvam niścitam iti dvitīyaṃ rūpam |
GSP28durdhpru:3946: iha api atra kecid evaṃ pratividadhati |
GSP28durdhpru:3948: yaś cāsau parvatādis tatra na vahnir jijñāsitaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3951: tatraikadeśasthadhūmadarśane 'py ekadeśavahnir jijñāsito jñāyata iti kiṃ sarvaparvatavyāpinā dhūmena kāryam? yadi punaḥ sarvatraiva vahnimattvaṃ jijñāsitaṃ syāt, syād evāyaṃ pakṣaikadeśāsiddhaḥ
GSP28durdhpru:3953: tataḥ katham asya tathātvaṃ? atra punaḥ sarveṣām eva tarūṇāṃ caitanyaṃ jijñāsitam iti sakalapādapavyāpinaiva svāpena prayojanam |
GSP28durdhpru:3954: yathā vedasya sarvasyaiva pauruṣeyatve sādhye sakalāmnāyavyāpakenaiva vākyatvena paryojanam
GSP28durdhpru:3957: eke tu -- lokādhyavasāyasiddhaṃ mahīdharāder ekatvam avalambyāyaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:3958: vyavahāraḥ, na ca sarveṣāṃ tarūṇāṃ tathaikatvaṃ loko 'dhyavasyati, yena svāpasyāpi tathā siddhir bhavati, tataḥ kim avadyaṃ nāmeti pratipannāḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3959: athābhidhīyate -- yadi kaścit tintiṅkāprabhṛtīn eva pādapān pakṣayitvā
GSP28durdhpru:3960: svāpaṃ hetūkaroti, tadā 'yaṃ na pakṣaikadeśāsiddha iti kiṃ na sādhayec
GSP28durdhpru:3963: yadi sarvajanaprasiddha indriyavyāpāravirodhyavasthāviśeṣaḥ svāpo nidrāparanāmā hetur abhipretas tadā 'yaṃ teṣv api taruṣv asddha iti kathaṃ caitanyam anumāpayet?
GSP28durdhpru:3964: atha yena kenacid upādhinā svāpaśabdamātravācyo 'rtho hetuḥ; tathāvidhasya svāpasya caitanyena vyāptyasidheḥ sandigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttikatayā 'naikāntikaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3970: pūrvāvadhāraṇe tu nāyaṃ nirākṛtaḥ syād iti darśayati yadīti |
GSP28durdhpru:3972: ayam asyāśayaḥ -- yady anumeya eva sattvaṃ yasyeti lakṣaṇaṃ syāt tadā sapakṣa eva sattvam iti vacanam atiricyamānaṃ lakṣaṇāntaraṃ bhaviṣyati |
GSP28durdhpru:3975: sandigdhaś cāsāv asya hetutvena viśeṣaṇatvena cāsiddho 'niścitaśabdeti vigrahaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3979: yathā 'nayor bhedo yathā cāntarbhāvas tathā parastāt pradarśayiṣyāmaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:3980: ihāśritatvādārthena nyāyena hetusattvasya viśeṣaṇarūpatvād anena sahoditi(ta) evakāro dharmāyogasya
GSP28durdhpru:3986: sa hi na sapakṣa eva vartate kin tu ubhayatra api |
GSP28durdhpru:3987: sattvagrahaṇāt pūrvāvadhāraṇavacanena sapakṣāvyāpisattākasya api prayatnānantarīyakasya hetutvaṃ kathitam |
GSP28durdhpru:3988: paścādavadhāraṇe tv ayam arthaḥ syāt -- sapakṣe sattvam eva yasya sa hetur iti prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ na hetuḥ syāt |
GSP28durdhpru:3993: tasminn asattvam eva niścitam -- tṛtīyaṃ rūpam |
GSP28durdhpru:3998: prayatnānantarīyakatve sādhye hy anityatvaṃ vipakṣaikadeśe vidyudādau
GSP28durdhpru:4001: asattvaśabdād dhi pūrvasminn avadhāraṇe 'yam arthaḥ syāt -- vipakṣa eva yo na asti sa hetuḥ
GSP28durdhpru:4002: | tathā ca prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ sapakṣe 'pi sarvatra sādhāraṇaś cāsau sapkṣāsapakṣavṛttitvād anaikāntikaś caikasmin sādhye viparyaye vā 'vyavasthitaś ceti tathā nirasta iti varttate |
GSP28durdhpru:4004: prayatnānantarīyakatvam apy anityatvasiddhau samartho hetur iti darśayituṃ sakalasapakṣāvyāpi prayatnānantarīyakatvam udāhṛtam iti draṣṭavyam |
GSP28durdhpru:4005: vastutas tu sarva eva kāryahetur dhūmādiḥ sapakṣaikadeśavṛttir boddhavyaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4007: evaṃ sati prayatnānantarīyakatvam upalakṣaṇatvād asya dhūmādikam api na hetuḥ syāt |
GSP28durdhpru:4009: ihāśrayatvādārthena nyāyena sapakṣalakṣaṇasya dharmiṇo viśeṣyatvād anena sahodito nipātaḥ pakṣe vṛkṣe vṛttau labdhāyāṃ samuccīyamānāvadhāraṇatvād asapakṣalakṣaṇadharmyanatarayogasya vyavacchedako draṣṭavyaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4010: tṛtīyaṃ rūpaṃ vyākhyātum āha -- asapakṣa iti |
GSP28durdhpru:4012: katham asya nirāsa ity āha -- viruddho hīti |
GSP28durdhpru:4015: kasmin sādhye kin tad īdṛśam ity āha -- prayatneti |
GSP28durdhpru:4023: nanu ca sapakṣa eva sattvam ity ukte vipakṣe 'sattvam eva iti gamyata eva
GSP28durdhpru:4024: | tat kimarthaṃ punar ubhayor upādānaṃ kṛtam? ucyate |
GSP28durdhpru:4026: [prayujyamānaḥ] niyamavān eva prayoktavyo na anyathā iti darśayituṃ dvayor apy upādānaṃ kṛtam |
GSP28durdhpru:4027: aniyate hi dvayor api prayoge 'yam arthaḥ syāt --
GSP28durdhpru:4028: sapakṣe yo 'sti vipakṣe ca yo na asti sa hetur iti |
GSP28durdhpru:4029: tathā ca sati sa śyāmaḥ tatputratvāt dṛśyamānaputravad evakāraṇeti yāvat |
GSP28durdhpru:4030: asapakṣa eveti kiṃ nāvadhāryata ity āha tathā ceti |
GSP28durdhpru:4036: tat kathaṃ nirasyate? tathā hi -- ya eva vipakṣe vīkṣito hetuḥ sa eva prameyatvādivad abhimataṃ na sādhayet |
GSP28durdhpru:4038: nopalakṣitaḥ sa katham aṅga sādhyaṃ na sādhayed iti? tad etad avadyam |
GSP28durdhpru:4039: yato yo 'pi vipakṣe vīkṣito hetuḥ so 'pi iṣṭo duṣṭaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4040: kathaṃ? sādhyaṃ vinā 'py upalabdher iti cet |
GSP28durdhpru:4041: nanu yadi nāmāsau sādhyam antareṇānyatra dṛṣṭas tathāpi vivādādhyāsite dharmiṇi sādhyaṃ kiṃ na sādhayati? na hi ayam atrāpi sādhyaṃ vinaiva varrtata iti prasādhakaṃ pramāṇam asti na caikatra yena vinā yo dṛṣṭaḥ sarvatrāsau tena vinaiva varttate iti siddham
GSP28durdhpru:4043: atha sādhyam antareṇa yo vṛttaḥ sādhye saty evāsau varttata iti niyamābhāvād vivādādhyāsite sandehahetur na samyag hetur bhavitum arhati |
GSP28durdhpru:4044: hanta tarhi vipakṣe tasya sādhyadharmiṇi sādhyavinākṛtāṃ vṛttiṃ sambhāvayad hetum aniściyahetūkarotīti āyātam |
GSP28durdhpru:4045: sati caivaṃ sādhyaviparyaye hetusattābādhakapramāṇādarśanam api -- yady ayaṃ ca dharmo bhaviṣyati, na ca tataḥ sādhyam ity evaṃ vidhāṃ vṛttim asya
GSP28durdhpru:4046: -- sambhāvayati tadā kim ayaṃ niścayahetur bhavitum arhati? tato
GSP28durdhpru:4047: vi[40a]pakṣe darśanaṃ vā tathā śaṅkābījam astu viparyaye vā bādhakapramāṇādarśanaṃ veti ko viśeṣaḥ? tathā cāha vārttikakāraḥ -- “na
GSP28durdhpru:4048: tu sapakṣavipakṣayoḥ sattvam asattvaṃ vā niśiyāpekṣam |
GSP28durdhpru:4053: tathā vipakṣapracārāśaṅkāvyavacchedena labhyaṃ gamakatvaṃ katham ātmasātkuryād” iti |
GSP28durdhpru:4055: vipakṣe 'sattvam eveti gamyata iti brubato 'yaṃ bhāvaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4056: pakṣe vṛttau labdhāyāṃ sapakṣa eva sattvaṃ niścitam iti khalu samuccīyamānāvadhāraṇo 'yaṃ nirṇayaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4057: ayaṃ cāsapakṣe 'sattve 'niścite sandigdhe vā na ghaṭata iti avaśyam asapakṣe 'sattvam
GSP28durdhpru:4061: tasmān niyamavator eva anvayavyatirekayoḥ prayogaḥ kartavyo yena pratibandho gamyeta sādhanasya sādhyena |
GSP28durdhpru:4062: niyamavatoś ca prayoge 'vaśyakartavye dvayor eka eva prayoktavyo na dvāv
GSP28durdhpru:4063: iti niyamavān eva anvayo vyatireko vā prayoktavya iti śikṣaṇārthaṃ dvayor upādānam iti |
GSP28durdhpru:4064: trairūpyakathanaprasaṅgena anumeyaḥ sapakṣo vipakṣaś ca uktaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4069: evam upalakṣaṇatvād asyāsapakṣe cāsattvam eva niścitam ity anena sapakṣe vṛttimātraṃ labdham eva |
GSP28durdhpru:4070: tenaiva ca prayojanam iti kiṃ sapakṣa eva sattvam ity aneneti drṣṭavyam |
GSP28durdhpru:4072: sādhyenānvīyamānatvaṃ tayeva sādhye bhavitṛtvaṃ sādhanasya svagato dharmo 'nvayaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4073: sādhyābhāve vyatiricyamānatvam abhavitṛtvaṃ hetoḥ savagato dharmo vyatirekaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4074: sa cāsaś ca[44]prayujyamānaḥ śabdena pratipādyamāṇo niyamavān avyabhicāravān prayoktavyo 'nyathā parokṣapratīty aṅga noktaṃ syāt |
GSP28durdhpru:4075: kathaṃ ca tathā prayukto bhavati? yadā 'nvayavākye sādhye niyataṃ sādhanaṃ vyatirekavākye ca sādhanābhāve niyataḥ sādhyābhāvaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4081: aniyamenāpi prayoge yady anvayavyatirekayos tādṛśoḥ pratītir asti tadā kiṃ niyamavat prayogeṇety āha -- aniyate hīti |
GSP28durdhpru:4083: āstāṃ tāvad ekasya prayoge dvayor apy ayam arthaḥ syād ity apiśabdaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4086: kā kṣatir ity āha -- tathā ceti |
GSP28durdhpru:4087: kākatālīyanyāyena cāśyāmeṣu nikaṭavarttiṣu atatputreṣu etad draṣṭavyam |
GSP28durdhpru:4090: yata evaṃ tasmād yena niyamavatprayogeṇa partibandhaḥ pratibaddhatvam āyattatvam |
GSP28durdhpru:4093: yady evam ekasminn eva sādhanavākye niyamavān evānvayo vyatirekaś ca prayujyatām ity āha -- niyamavatoś ceti |
GSP28durdhpru:4095: ayam āśayaḥ -- anvayavākyenāpi tathāprayuktena sāmarthyād vyatirekasya,
GSP28durdhpru:4096: vyatirekavākyenāpi sāmarthyād anvayasya prakāśanāt kiṃ pratītapratyāyakena dvitīyavākyena kāryam iti? yata evam itis tasmād |
GSP28durdhpru:4100: anena prayo[40b]gasamāsa eva darśito na rūpasamāsa iti darśitam |
GSP28durdhpru:4101: prayogadarśanābhyāsāt kaścit prayogabhaṅgyaiva svayam api parokṣam arthaṃ pratipadyata iti svārthe 'py anumāne nirṇītam idaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:4109: vyāptiniścayakāle tu dharmo anumeya iti darśayitum atragrahanam |
GSP28durdhpru:4110: jijñāsito jñātum iṣṭo viśeṣo dharmo yasya dharmiṇaḥ sa tathā uktaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4114: samānaḥ sadṛśo yo 'rthaḥ pakṣeṇa sa pakṣa ukta upacārāt samānaśabdena viśiṣyate |
GSP28durdhpru:4115: samānaḥ pakṣaḥ sapakṣaḥ, samānasya ca saśabdādeśaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4116: nanu yadi dharmadharmisamudāyo mukhyo 'numeyo 'tra gṛhyate tadā na
GSP28durdhpru:4118: grahaṇe vā vyaktam eva vaiyarthyam ity abhiprāyavān pṛcchati -- tatra ka iti teṣu madhye |
GSP28durdhpru:4125: atha yad saha pakṣeṇa varttate iti sapakṣo 'bhipretas tadā 'rthāsaṅgatiḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4126: athāpi samānaḥ pakṣeṇeti mataṃ tadā pakṣasamāna iti prāpnotīty abhipretya pṛcchati ka iti
GSP28durdhpru:4133: nanu samānaś cāsau pakṣaś ceti kiṃ nābhipretam? tatra pakṣa evāsau
GSP28durdhpru:4134: dṛṣṭāntadharmī kathaṃ yena samānaśabdena viśiṣyata ity āha -- pakṣa iti |
GSP28durdhpru:4135: katham anyārthena tena śabdena sa tathocyatām ity āha -- upacārād iti |
GSP28durdhpru:4137: tatra so 'rthaḥ pakṣa uktaḥ iti yojyam |
GSP28durdhpru:4139: sa upacārād yaḥ pakṣa uktaḥ viśi(śe)ṣyate vyavacchedyate tadasamānāt |
GSP28durdhpru:4140: yadi samānaśabdo viśeṣaṇam asya tarhi saśabdaśrutiḥ katham ity āha -- samānasyeti |

GSP28durdhpru:4417: yasmād dvayam etad upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptim avocad ācāryas tat tasmād atra prastave 'yam artho vācyo 'bhimataḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4419: ekaś cāsau vivakṣitaḥ pratipattā ceti tathā tadapekṣam idaṃ pratyakṣalakṣaṇam |
GSP28durdhpru:4420: yaḥ svabhāvaḥ satsv anyeṣūpalambhapratyayāntareṣu san pratyakṣa eva bhavatīty evaṃ rūpaṃ |
GSP28durdhpru:4421: ekaś ca pratipattā sa eva vācyo yo 'vyavadhānādideśo draṣṭuṃ pravṛttaś ca
GSP28durdhpru:4422: | tathāvidhe ca draṣṭari tathāvidho 'vaśyaṃ pratyakṣa eva bhavatīti |
GSP28durdhpru:4423: tathāpi kathaṃ pūrvapakṣātikrama ity āha tathā ceti tasmiṃś ca prakāre sati |
GSP28durdhpru:4428: draṣṭum apraṛttasya tu yogyadeśasthā api draṣṭuṃ te na śakyāḥ
GSP28durdhpru:4431: tad evaṃ paśyataḥ kasyacin na pratyayāntaravikalo nāma,
GSP28durdhpru:4433: apaśyatas tu draṣṭuṃ śakyo yogyadeśasthaḥ pratyayāntaravikalaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4435: adṛśyamānāpi svabhāvaviśeṣavantas tadā kiṃ svabhāvaviśeṣagrahaṇenety āha adṛśyamānā iti |
GSP28durdhpru:4441: ayam atra prakaraṇārthaḥ ekapratipattrapekṣayā yas tathāvidhaḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'pi yady upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptilakṣaṇatvena nopādīyate, tadā teṣām api deśādiviprakarṣiṇāṃ pratyayāntarasākalyam upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptir astīty upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptānām anupalambhād abhāvavyavahāraḥ pravarttanīyaḥ syāt |
GSP28durdhpru:4443: tasmād viśiṣṭapratipattrapekṣam idaṃ svabhāvaviśeṣasya lakṣaṇam ity upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptilakṣaṇaṃ sūktam iti |
GSP28durdhpru:4444: pratyayāntarasākalyavattvam eva teṣāṃ sādhayann āha yair iti |
GSP28durdhpru:4446: etad eva kutaḥ siddhyatīty āha ata iti |
GSP28durdhpru:4449: sannihitās te pratyayā yad yasmād draṣṭuṃ pravṛttas tadviviktaṃ draṣṭuṃ pravṛtto yata ity arthaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4450: yad vā tad eva nirīkṣituṃ pravṛtto yata iti |
GSP28durdhpru:4453: darśanapravṛttapuruṣāpekṣayā tāvad arthasyaivaṃprakāravattvaṃ, draṣṭum apravṛttasya tu sa kīdṛśa ity āha draṣṭum apravṛttasyeti |
GSP28durdhpru:4454: tunā draṣṭuṃ pravṛttād apravṛttasya bhedam āha |
GSP28durdhpru:4455: yāvaty eva deśe sati tasmin pratyayāntare dṛśyante 'rthaḥ sa eva yogyo
GSP28durdhpru:4457: tasmād dṛśyād anye ye cakṣurādayo hetavas tāni pratyayāntarāṇi |
GSP28durdhpru:4458: teṣāṃ vaikalyam abhāvas, tadvantaḥ hetubhāvena viśeṣaṇād |
GSP28durdhpru:4459: ata eva draṣṭuṃ te na śakyāḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4460: svabhāvaviśeṣas tu teṣām astīti darśayann āha svabhāveti |
GSP28durdhpru:4462: tathāvidhapuruṣāpekṣayā deśakālaviprakṛṣṭānāṃ tu kā vārttety āha dūreti |
GSP28durdhpru:4464: ye hi deśena viprakṛṣṭās te dūradeśā ye ca kālena te dūrakālā bhavantīti bhāvaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4468: athavā ekapratipattrapekṣam idam ity anyathā vyākhyāyate --
GSP28durdhpru:4470: na ca te 'py anupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptāḥ śakyā vaktuṃ
GSP28durdhpru:4471: yato vyavacchidyeran tathāpi piśāco 'pi sajātīyair upalabhyate evaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:4473: tathā kālaviprakṛṣṭo 'pi tatkālikair iti vyāvarttyābhāvād upa--
GSP28durdhpru:4479: kīdṛśo hetuḥ sādhyasya svabhāva ity āha -- svasya ātmanaḥ sattā |
GSP28durdhpru:4481: tasmin sati bhavituṃ śīlaṃ yasya iti |
GSP28durdhpru:4482: yo hetor ātmanaḥ sattām apekṣya vidyamāno bhavati, na tu heutsattāyā vyatiriktaṃ kañcid dhetum apekṣate sa svasattāmātrabhāvī sādhyaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4483: tasmin sādhye yo hetuḥ sa svabhāvaḥ tasya sādhyasya na anyaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4485: yathā vṛkṣo ayaṃ śiṃśapātvād iti II-16
GSP28durdhpru:4490: tad ayam arthaḥ -- vṛkṣavyavahārayogyo 'yam, śiṃśapāvyavahārayogyatvād iti |
GSP28durdhpru:4491: yatra pracuraśiṃśape deśe 'viditaśiṃśapāvyavahāro jaḍo yadā kenacid
GSP28durdhpru:4492: uccāṃ śiṃśapāṃ upādarśya ucyate `ayaṃ vṛkṣaḥ' iti tadāsau jāḍyāc
GSP28durdhpru:4493: chiṃśapāyā uccatvam api vṛkṣavyavahārasya nimittam avasyati tadā yām eva anuccām paśyati śiṃśapāṃ tām eva avṛkṣam avasyati |
GSP28durdhpru:4495: labdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyeti viśeṣaṇam anarthakam ity āśaṅkyāha tad ayam atrārtha iti |
GSP28durdhpru:4496: tadā tu pratyakṣaśabdenopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptatvaṃ vācyaṃ tasya lakṣaṇam idaṃ pūrvoktam iti yojyam |
GSP28durdhpru:4497: ekapratipattrapekṣam idaṃ pratyakṣalakṣaṇam upalabdhilakṣaṇam ity arthaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4498: tathāpi kathaṃ codyātikrama ity āha tathā ceti |
GSP28durdhpru:4501: sāmānyavṛttir apy ayaṃ svabhāvaśabdaḥ sādhyadharmasya śrutatvāt tasyaiva svabhāve vartate ity abhiprāyeṇa sādhyasya svabhāva ity abhyavādīt |
GSP28durdhpru:4502: hetoḥ svarūpasya cintanāt svaśabdena tasyaivātmā vivakṣitaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4503: etad eva yo hetor ityādinā sphuṭayati |
GSP28durdhpru:4511: kāryaṃ yathā vahnir atra dhūmād iti II-17
GSP28durdhpru:4515: kāryakāraṇabhāvo loke pratyakṣānupalambhanibandhanaḥ pratīta iti na svabhāvasyeva kāryasya lakṣaṇam uktam |
GSP28durdhpru:4517: udāhriyate pradarśyate svabhāvahetur anenety udāharaṇaṃ svabhāvahetupratipādakaṃ vākyam |
GSP28durdhpru:4518: idaṃ ca svabhāvahetor arthakathanaṃ na tu tatprayogopadarśanam |
GSP28durdhpru:4519: prayogas tu yaḥ śiṃśapātvavyavahārayogyaḥ sa vṛkṣatvavyavahārayogyaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4522: nanu ca yaḥ śiṃśapā paśyati sa vṛkṣaṃ jānāty eva |
GSP28durdhpru:4523: tat katham atra sādhyasādhanabhāva ity āha tad ayam iti |
GSP28durdhpru:4525: na caitad yathāśruti saṅgacchate tat tasmāt vṛkṣo 'yaṃ vṛkṣavyavahārayogyo 'yaṃ śiṃśapātvāt śiṃśapāvyavahārayogyatvād ity ayam artho vācyaḥ vṛkṣo 'yaṃ śiṃśapātvād ity asya vākyasyeti prakaraṇāt |
GSP28durdhpru:4527: nanu yo viditavṛkṣavyavahāraḥ sa svayaṃ pratyakṣeṇaiva taṃ vyavahāraṃ pravartayiṣyati tat katham asyānumānasyāvatāra ity āha tatreti vākyopakṣepe |
GSP28durdhpru:4529: anena ca prabandhena mūḍhaṃ praty etad vyavahārasādhanam anumānam iti darśitam |
GSP28durdhpru:4532: vṛkṣatvavyavahāravyutpattiṃ kāryamāṇa evāropitoccatvādinimittaḥ, tadā kena dṛṣṭāntena bodhayitavyaḥ? ādita eva tena śākhādimattvamātraṃ nimittaṃ na
GSP28durdhpru:4536: tadāsau jāḍyād uccatvam api nimittam avasyatītīdam etasmin mūḍhe pratipattari yojanīyam |
GSP28durdhpru:4537: yaḥ prathamaṃ tāvat śiṃśapāgataṃ śākhādimattvamātram eva nimittam avasāya vṛkṣavyavahāraṃ prāvartayat paścāj jāḍyavaśāt tanmātraṃ nimittaṃ vismṛtyānyad eva vṛkṣavyavahārakāle uccatvam api nimittam āsīd iti vyāmuhya tadoccatvam api vṛkṣavyavahāranimittam avakalpayatīti |
GSP28durdhpru:4538: sa caivaṃbhūto jaḍaḥ śiṃśapāvyavahārayogyatvena hetunā prathamaṃ pravartitatanmātranimittavṛkṣavyavahārayā tadānīṃ tathāsmāritayā śiṃśapayā dṛṣṭāntena vṛkṣavyavahārayogyatāṃ bodhayituṃ śakyata eva yaḥ punar ādita evāropitoccatvādinimittas taṃ prati hetūpanyāsa eva na yujyate |
GSP28durdhpru:4540: tarhi? vṛkṣavyavahārasamayam evāsau grāhayitavya iti sarvam avadātam |
GSP28durdhpru:4542: nanu trirūpatvād ekam eva liṅgaḥ yuktaṃ |
GSP28durdhpru:4544: evaṃ sati svabhāvahetor ekasyānantaprakāratvāt trirūpam ayuktam ity āha --
GSP28durdhpru:4545: atra dvau vastusādhanau ekaḥ pratiṣedhahetuḥ II-18
GSP28durdhpru:4547: atra ity eṣu triṣu madhye dvau hetū vastusādhanau --
GSP28durdhpru:4550: pratiṣedha iti ca abhāvo 'bhavavyavahāraś ca ukto draṣṭavyaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4551: idānīṃ kāryahetuṃ vivarītum āha -- kāryam iti |
GSP28durdhpru:4552: hetoḥ prakṛtatvāt kāryam iti kāryahetum ity avaseyaṃ sukhapratipatty artham |
GSP28durdhpru:4558: vyāptivediny api puṃsi hetur anuvādyenaiva rūpeṇa nirdiśyamāna prathamānta eva nirdeśyaḥ atra dhūma iti |
GSP28durdhpru:4560: na ca tathāvidhaṃ praty api pratijñā anyathā ka enām asādhanāṅga brūyāt |
GSP28durdhpru:4562: īdṛśas tu prayogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ -- yatra dhūmas tatra sarvatra vahnir yathā
GSP28durdhpru:4564: svabhāvānupalabdhyor iva kāryahetor api kasmāl lakṣaṇam ācāryeṇa na praṇītam ity āśaṅkām apākurvann āha -- kāryeti |
GSP28durdhpru:4569: ayam abhiprāyaḥ anupalabdhau khalu bahavo vipratipannāḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4571: kumārilas tu vastvantarasyaikajñānasaṃsargitām anapekṣyaivānyamātrasya jñānam anupalabdhim abhāvapramāṇatayā varṇayati |
GSP28durdhpru:4575: yad āha -- “sātmano 'pariṇāmo vā vijñānaṃ vānyavastuni” iti |[46]
GSP28durdhpru:4577: [46] ŚV abhāvapariccheda 11cdsātmanaḥ pariṇāmo vā vijñānaṃ vākyavastuni |
GSP28durdhpru:4579: kecid arthāntarāpekṣiṇy api dharme svabhāvaṃ hetum adhyavasitāḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4580: kecit tu vastuno dharmiviśeṣam āśritaṃ svabhāvam iti |
GSP28durdhpru:4582: atra tu kāryatvarūpe na kecid vipratipadyanta iti nāsya lakṣaṇām uktam iti |
GSP28durdhpru:4583: kāryakāraṇabhāvena gamyagamakabhāve sarvathā gamyagamakabhāvaprasaṅga ityādikāyāṃ vipratipattāv api na kāryasya lakṣaṇe viprtipatti |
GSP28durdhpru:4586: sā cānyatra nirākṛtā 'trāpi prājñaiḥ svayam abhyūhyā
GSP28durdhpru:4588: samprati trirūpāṇi ca trīṇy evety asahamānaḥ prāha -- nanv iti |
GSP28durdhpru:4591: prakārasya svarūpasya bhedād viśeṣāt bhedo nānātvam |
GSP28durdhpru:4596: tad ayam arthaḥ -- hetuḥ sādhyasiddyarthatvāt sādhyāṅgam, sādhyaṃ pradhānam |
GSP28durdhpru:4597: ataś ca sādhyopakaraṇasya hetuḥ pradhānasādhyabhedād bhedaḥ,
GSP28durdhpru:4599: sādhyaś ca kaścid vidhiḥ, kaścit pratiśedhaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4600: vidhipratiṣedhayoś ca parasparaparihāreṇa avasthānāt heyor hetū bhinnau |
GSP28durdhpru:4601: vidhir api kaścid dhetor bhinnaḥ, kaścid abhinnaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4603: tataḥ sādhyasya parasparavirodhāt hetavo bhinnāḥ, na tu svata eveti ||
GSP28durdhpru:4604: kasmāt punas trayāṇām hetutvam, kasmāt ca anyeṣām hetutvam ity āśaṅkya
GSP28durdhpru:4605: yathā trayāṇām eva hetutvam anyeṣāṃ ca ahetutvaṃ tad ubhayaṃ darśayitum āha --
GSP28durdhpru:4606: svabhāvapratibandhe hi saty artho arthaṃ gamayet II-19
GSP28durdhpru:4609: gamakāv iti vivṛṇvan sādhayata iti sādhanāv iti kartari lyuṭaṃ darśayati |
GSP28durdhpru:4610: atra ca vastunaḥ sādhanāv evety avadhāraṇīyaṃ na tu vastuna eveti |
GSP28durdhpru:4613: pratiṣedhasya hetur evety avadhāraṇīyaṃ na tv ayam eveti pūrvābhyām api sāmarthyāt pratiṣedhasya sādhanāt |
GSP28durdhpru:4614: nanu na dṛśyānupalambhenābhāvaḥ sādhyate tasya pratyakṣasiddhatvāt |
GSP28durdhpru:4618: tarhi vyāpakānupalambhādinā vyāpyādyabhāve sādhye kenābhāvaḥ sādhitaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4619: tataḥ kim atra pratiṣedhaśabdena pratipattavyam ity āśaṅkyāha pratiṣedha iti |
GSP28durdhpru:4621: tena pratiṣedha ity anena śabdenābhāvo 'bhāvavyavahāraś cokto draṣṭavya ity arthaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4622: ekasya pratiṣedhena iti mukhyayā vṛttyā saṅgraho 'nyasya
GSP28durdhpru:4624: nāstīti jñānaṃ nāstītyabhidhānaṃ niḥśaṅkātra gamanāgamanalakṣaṇā pravṛttir vyavahāraḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4625: sa ca haṭhāt pravarttayituṃ na śakyata iti tadyogyataiva sādhyeti draṣṭavyam |
GSP28durdhpru:4626: evaṃ tu svabhāvahetāv antarbhāve 'py anupalambhasya tataḥ pṛthakkaraṇaṃ pratipattradhyavasāyavaśād ity avaseyam |
GSP28durdhpru:4629: tat katham idam uttaraṃ pūrvapakṣam iti varttatām ity āśaṅkyāha -- tad ayam iti |
GSP28durdhpru:4630: yasmād idam uttarīkṛtam ācāryeṇa yathāśruti ca pūrvapakṣaṃ nātikrāmati tat tasmād ayam artho vākyasyāyaṃ tātparyārth ity arthaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4631: etam evārthaṃ hetur ityādinā na tu svata evety antena granthe pratipādayati ||
GSP28durdhpru:4632: atha katham anyo 'rtho 'nyam arthaṃ na vyabhicarati yenaite trayo hetavaḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:4633: ya[45a]thā cāmīṣāṃ svasādhyasādhanād gamakatvaṃ tathā 'nyeṣām apy akāryasvabhāvānupalambhātmanāṃ kiṃ na bhavatīti manvānaḥ praśnenopakramate
GSP28durdhpru:4635: kasmād iti sāmānyato hetuṃ pṛcchati punar iti viśeṣataḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4645: kāraṇe svabhāve vā sādhye svabhāvena pratibandhaḥ kāryasvabhāvayor aviśiṣṭa ity ekena samāsena dvayor api saṃgrahaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4647: yasmāt svabhāvapratibandhe sati sādhanārthaḥ sādhyārthaṃ gamayet tasmāt trayāṇāṃ gamakatvam anyeṣām agamakatvam |
GSP28durdhpru:4648: kasmāt punaḥ svabhavapratibandha eva sati gamyagamakabhāvo na anyathety āha --
GSP28durdhpru:4653: yo yatra svabhāvena na pratibaddhaḥ tasya tadapratibaddhasya tadavyabhicāraniyamābhāvāt |
GSP28durdhpru:4654: tasyāpratibhandaviṣayasyāvyabhicāraḥ tadavyabhicāraḥ tasya niyamaḥ tadavyabhicāraniyamaḥ tasyābhāvāt
GSP28durdhpru:4655: tad ayam arthaḥ -- na hi yo yatra svabhāvena na pratibaddhaḥ, sa tam apratibandhaviṣayam avaśyam eva na vyabhicāratīti nāsti tayor avyabhicāraniyamaḥ -- avinābhāvaniyamaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4660: 2.1.32] iti sūtram apanīya galecopaka ityādisiddhy artha “sādhanaṃ kṛtā”
GSP28durdhpru:4663: anena ca tṛtīyāsamāsenaiva kāryasvabhāvayoḥ saṃgrahād āvṛttyā ṣāṣṭhīsaptamīsamāsābhyāṃ kāryasvabhāvayoḥ saṃgraha iti yat pūrvair vyākhyātaṃ tad apavyākhyānam iti khyāpitam |
GSP28durdhpru:4665: anena pratibandhaśabdena pratibaddhatvam āyattatvam ucyata iti darśayati |
GSP28durdhpru:4667: pratibaddheti yaḥ svarūpeṇa kvacid āyattas tas tasya svabhās tatra pratibaddha āyatta ity arthābhedena pratibaddhasvabhāvatvam ity artha iti spaṣṭīkṛtam |
GSP28durdhpru:4668: nanu pūrveṣām abhimatasamāsavyudāsena tṛtīyāsamāsaṃ darśayatā kiṃ svid ati yo labdhaḥ? kevalam āhopuruṣikā prakāśitety āśaṅkya pūrvaṃ buddhistham eva sphuṭayitum āha -- kāraṇa iti |
GSP28durdhpru:4672: na hi yogyatayā pradīpavat parokṣārthapratipattinimittam iṣṭaṃ liṅgam api tv avyabhicāritvena niścitam |
GSP28durdhpru:4673: tataḥ svabhāvapratibandhe saty avinābhāvitvaniścayaḥ, tato gamyagamakabhāvaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4674: tasmāt svabhāvapratibandhe saty artho 'rthaṃ gamayen nānyathety sthitam |
GSP28durdhpru:4676: tad iha sādhyasādhanayoḥ kasya kva pratibandha ity āha --
GSP28durdhpru:4677: sa ca pratibandhaḥ sādhye arthe liṅgasya II-21
GSP28durdhpru:4678: pratibandha ity akāṅkṣāyām āha -- kāryasvabhāvayos tayor eva prakṛtatvāt |
GSP28durdhpru:4680: dvayor api kāryasvabhāvayor atiśaye saṅgrahaḥ svīkāraḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4684: yata evaṃ tasmād anyesāṃ tadvyatiriktānām |teṣāṃ svabhāvapratibandhābhāvāt |
GSP28durdhpru:4687: tādātmyatadutpattibhāve ca kāryasvabhāvayor evāntarbhāva iti bhāvaḥ ||
GSP28durdhpru:4688: tad ityādinā samāsaṃ pradarśya tadapratibaddhasyeti yojayatā dharmottareṇa mūle tadapatibaddhasyeti pāṭho darśitaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4690: tatrāpi pāṭhe tadapratibaddhaḥ sādhyāprtibaddhaḥ svabhāvaḥ svarūpaṃ yasya liṅgasyeti vigrahaḥ kāryaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4691: pratibandhaḥ pratibaddhatvam āyattatvaṃ yatsādhanasya, tasya viṣayo 'vyabhicāras tena vinā 'bhavitṛtvam |
GSP28durdhpru:4694: apratibandhaviṣayaṃ na vyabhicaratīty āśaṅkyāha -- tad ayam artham iti |
GSP28durdhpru:4695: yata evaṃ uktam tat tasmād ayaṃ tātparyārthaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4697: na ca tadaharastamayaḥ, maharṣiṇā 'nyena vā mahardhinā kenacit tasyāstamayavibandhasambhavāt
GSP28durdhpru:4698: tasmād ādityasya tasmād astamayayogyataiva sādhyā -- ayam ādityodayo 'stamayayogya udayatvāt
GSP28durdhpru:4700: sati caivaṃ svabhāvahetutvam asyāyātam iti bhāvaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4701: nanu cāvyabhicāramātreṇa prayojanam, tat kiṃ niyamenety āha |
GSP28durdhpru:4707: api tu kin tv vyabhicāritvena sādhyasya prakṛtatvāt sādhyāvinābhāvitvena niścitam |
GSP28durdhpru:4708: niyamābhāve ca kuto 'vyabhicāraniścaya ity asya tātparyārthaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4709: niścīyatāṃ tad avyabhicāro 'nyeṣām api, pratibandhas tu kasmān mṛgyata ity āha --
GSP28durdhpru:4713: 'vyabhicāra eva na śakyate niścetum ity arthād anena darśitam |
GSP28durdhpru:4715: 'pi kathaṃ gamakatvaṃ ity āha -- tata iti tato niścitād avyabhicārāl liṅgasya gamakatve siddhe sādhyasyāpi gamaka(gamya)tvaṃ siddhyatīti dvayor upanyāsaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4716: uktam artham upasaṃharann āha -- tasmād iti |
GSP28durdhpru:4725: pratibandhaviṣayo na tu pratibaddha ity arthaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4729: yasya ca dharmasya yo niyataḥ svabhāvaḥ sa tatpratibaddaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4731: yasya tu sa cānyaś ca svabhāvaḥ ca pratibandhaviṣayaḥ, na tu pratibaddhaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4737: nanu bhinnayor gamyagamakabhāve liṅgaṃ tadutpattyā parāyattatvāt pratibaddham |
GSP28durdhpru:4742: tataḥ pratibaddhatvaṃ pratibandhaviṣayatvaṃ vā dvayor aviśiṣṭam āyāti |
GSP28durdhpru:4743: tadāśrayaś ca niyataḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvaḥ prasakta ity āha -- tatrāyam artha iti |
GSP28durdhpru:4744: na kevalam arthāntaratva ity api śabdaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4745: yat pratibaddham iti yat sādhyapratibaddhatayā tadāyattatayā niścitam iti draṣṭavyam |
GSP28durdhpru:4747: nanu tādātmyāviśeṣād ekas tatra pratibandhaviṣayatayā na tu pratibaddhatayety ayam eva vibhāgaḥ kuta ity āha -- yasyeti |
GSP28durdhpru:4748: yad vā tādātmyānubhāvini dvaye kin tatra pratibaddhaṃ yad gamakaṃ kiñ ca pratibandhaviṣayo yad gamyam ity ajānantam praty āha -- ysyeti |
GSP28durdhpru:4750: yasya dharmasya vyāvṛttikalpitasya yo niyataḥ pratiniyataḥ sa eva svabhāvo na tad anyo 'pi
GSP28durdhpru:4752: tad iti ya iti prathamāntenoktaḥ pratyavamṛṣṭas tasmin pratibaddha iti vigrahaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4761: prayatnānantaryakatvasya hy anityatvam eva svabhāvo na tu nityatvam api |
GSP28durdhpru:4763: īdṛśasya tāvad iyaṃ gatir anyasya tu kā vārttetyāha -- yasyeti |
GSP28durdhpru:4766: sa ca so 'pi prayatnānantaryākhyo 'nyaś ca saś ca(cā)prayatnānantarīyako
GSP28durdhpru:4769: etad eva vyatirekamukheṇa draḍhayati -- na tv iti |
GSP28durdhpru:4781: sa sādhyo 'rtha ātmā svabhāvo yasya tat tadātmā |
GSP28durdhpru:4784: yataḥ sādhyasvabhāvaṃ sādhanaṃ tasmāt tatra svabhāvapratibandha ity arthaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4785: yadi sādhyasvabhāvaṃ sādhanaṃ sādhyasādhanayor abhedāt pratijñārthaikadeśo hetuḥ syād ity āha -- vastuta iti |
GSP28durdhpru:4790: tato niścayāruddharupāpekṣa eva tayor bhedao yuktaḥ vāstavas tv abheda iti |
GSP28durdhpru:4791: na kevalāt tādātmyād api tu tataḥ sādhyād arthād utpattir liṅgasya --
GSP28durdhpru:4793: syād etat tādātmyaṃ tāvat tayor asti |
GSP28durdhpru:4796: tad apekṣāyām api kim iti prayatnānantarīyakatvam eva gamakam ity āha --
GSP28durdhpru:4800: tad evāvnityatve pratibaddham ucyata iti śeṣaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4802: yatpatibddhatayā niścitaṃ tad eva gamakam itarad gamyaṃ tasmān niyataḥ patiniyataḥ prayatnāntarīyakam eva gamakam, anityatva ca gamyam evety evaṃrūpo viṣayo yasya gamyagamakabhāvasya sa tathā etad eva vyatirekamukhena draḍhayati nānyatheti ||
GSP28durdhpru:4803: nanu ca ya ekasyānyatra pratibandhas tadāyattatvaṃ sa tāvan nāhetukaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4804: kaś cāsau hetur ity abhipretya praśnayati -- kasmād iti |
GSP28durdhpru:4806: tādātmyād iti maulam uttara vyākhyātum āha -- yata iti |
GSP28durdhpru:4807: tatra sādhye svabhāvena pratibandhaḥ pratibaddhatvaṃ liṅgasyeti śeṣaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4810: atra ca sādhyasādhanayor aikātmyasya pratutatvāt sādhyalakṣaṇasya pratijñārthasya hetuvamāsaktam
GSP28durdhpru:4813: yadi paramārthato 'bhedaḥ, kathaṃ tarhi bhedanibandhano gamyagamakabhāva ity āha -- vikalpeti
GSP28durdhpru:4815: ko 'sau vikalpaviṣayaḥ? yadi bāhyas tadā tadavastho doṣa ity āha -- yad iti |
GSP28durdhpru:4818: kasmān nimittadvayāt svabhāvapratibandho liṅgasya nānyasmād ity āha --
GSP28durdhpru:4819: atatsvabhāvasya atadutpatteś ca tatra apratibaddhasvabhāvatvāt II-23
GSP28durdhpru:4824: yo yatsvabhāvo yadutpattiś ca na bhavati tasya atatsvabhāvasyātadutpatteś ca |
GSP28durdhpru:4825: tatra atatsvabhāve anutpādake cāpratibaddaḥ svabhāvo 'syeti so 'yam
GSP28durdhpru:4829: yady atatsvabhāve 'nutpādake ca kaścit pratibaddhasvabhāvo bhaved, bhaved anyato 'pi nimittāt svabhāvapratibandhaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4834: idaṃ sādhanam idaṃ sādhyam iti sādhyasādhanarūpo bhedo nānātvam ity arthaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4835: yadi nāma kalpanānirmito bhedas tathāpi kathaṃ gamyagamakabhāva ity āha -- niścayeti |
GSP28durdhpru:4838: yata evaṃ tatas tasyāt tayoḥ sādhyasādhanayor bhedo nānātvaṃ yuktyā saṅgato yuktaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4841: syān matam -- bhedena kalpitayor na tādātmyaṃ gamyagamakabhāvanibandhanam asti |
GSP28durdhpru:4842: vāstavena ca rūpeṇaikatvān na gamyagamakabhāva iti kathaṃ svabhāvahetor gamakatvam? nāhetutvam
GSP28durdhpru:4843: yad darśanadvārāyātāv etau dharmau tathāpratīyamānau tat tāvat paramārthatas tadātmakam ity ekasya dharmasya dharmāntarāvyabhicāraḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4844: vāstavaṃ tadātmyagataṃ ca yasya gamakatvaṃ sa svabhāvahetur ucyata iti ko virodhaḥ?
GSP28durdhpru:4845: ayaṃ prakaraṇārthaḥ -- na niścayasthe samāropite rūpe samāropitatvenādhyavasīyamāne gamyagamake kin tu svalakṣaṇatvenādhyavasīyamāne |
GSP28durdhpru:4851: tad avadhyavasitabhedanibandhano gamyagamakabhāvas tasya svataś ca tādātmyam iti dvitīyaṃ pratibandhakāraṇaṃ vyākhyātum āha -- na kevalād iti |
GSP28durdhpru:4853: nanu ca samavāyādito 'pi nimittāt pratibandho nāsambhavī |
GSP28durdhpru:4854: tat kathaṃ tādātmyāt tadutpatter eva ca sa ucyate ity abhiprāyavān pṛcchati -- kasmād iti
GSP28durdhpru:4858: yadi samavāyādir anyaḥ sambandhaḥ pramāṇabādhito na bhavet |
GSP28durdhpru:4860: tat kuto 'sāv asann asya nimittaṃ bhaveti |
GSP28durdhpru:4862: apratibaddhasvabhāvatvād iti mūlasya bhāvapratyayaṃ tyaktvā vigraham āha -- apratibaddha iti
GSP28durdhpru:4866: kasmāt punar anyato nimittān na bhavatīy āha -- pratibaddheti
GSP28durdhpru:4871: anyasya sambandhasyābhāvāt tādātmyatadutpattyabhāve ceti prakaraṇalabhyaṃ kṛtvā na cānyaḥ kścid āyattasvabhāva ity uktam |
GSP28durdhpru:4872: nanu cāsaty api tādātmye tadutpattau cānyatrāsvabhāve 'nutpādake cānyat pratibaddhaṃ yathā -- ātapo vṛkṣacchāyāyām |
GSP28durdhpru:4890: nidarśayitum? etāvat tūcyate -- yad yenāvinābhūtaṃ dṛśyate tat tatra pratibaddham |
GSP28durdhpru:4892: ata eva trīṇy eva liṅgānīti saṃkhyāniyamo
GSP28durdhpru:4897: amīṣāṃ madhye yeṣāṃ pratibandho 'sti teṣāṃ tādātmyatadutpattyor anyataram sambhavād, yeṣu ca tad abhāvas teṣām apratibandhād agamakatvāt |
GSP28durdhpru:4898: tathā hi vṛkṣasya chāyāyām ekasāmagryadhīnatayaiva pratibandhaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4900: chāyā hi pratibhāsamānarūpasaṃsthānavatī śaityādyarthakriyākāriṇī vastv eva, na tv evālokābhāvaḥ
GSP28durdhpru:4901: sā ca pūrvasmād ālolopādānāt pūrvavṛkṣakṣaṇād vṛkṣakṣaṇena sārdham utpadyate |
GSP28durdhpru:4903: 'rvāgbhāganamanāvanamane api tulāyāḥ parabhāgonnamanāvanamanābhyām eva samaṃ puruṣaprayatnād eva tathāvidhāt tadupādānasaha[47a]kāriṇa utpadyete
GSP28durdhpru:4905: pāṇis tv apratibaddha eva, vyaṅgasyāpi sambhavāt |
GSP28durdhpru:4910: dṛśyādṛśyasamudāyaś ca yathāyogaṃ sarvatra dharmī karttavyaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4917: ekasmād eva mahābhūtaviśeṣāt kālavyavahāraviṣayād etad utpādāpekṣiṇas teṣām utpādāt |
GSP28durdhpru:4918: tathā ya eva kṛttikodayahetur mahābhūtaviśeṣaḥ kālasaṃjñitaḥ sa eva katipayakālavyavadhānena rohiṇyudayahetur iti tad darśanād hetos tajjananayogyatādharmo 'numīyate eva |
GSP28durdhpru:4919: tathā pipīlikotsaraṇasya matsyavikārasya ca yo hetuḥ sa eva katipayakālavyavadhānena varṣakaraṇayogyas tataḥ pūrvavad
GSP28durdhpru:4920: hetudharmānumānam, rūparasayor ivaikasāmagryadhīnatayaiva vā tat samakālikavarṣaṇānumānam
GSP28durdhpru:4923: atha jalaprasādaṃ dṛṣṭvodeṣyatīty anumīyate, tadā tasmād eva mahābhūtāt kālasaṃjñitāj jalaprasādaḥ
GSP28durdhpru:4927: kāryasvabhāvayor eva tu gamakatvaṃ kathaṃ ity āha --
GSP28durdhpru:4928: te ca tādātmyatadupattī svabhāvakāryayor eva iti tābhyām eva vastusiddhiḥ II-24
GSP28durdhpru:4931: yasmāt svabhāve kārye eva ca tādātmyatadutpattī sthite tannibandhanaś ca gamyagamakabhāvas tasmāt tābhyām eva kāryasvabhāvyāṃ vastuno vidheḥ siddhiḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4932: atha pratiṣedhasiddhir dṛśyānupalambhād api kasmān neṣṭety āha --
GSP28durdhpru:4933: pratiṣedhasiddhir api yathoktā yā eva anupalabdheḥ II-25
GSP28durdhpru:4934: pratiṣedhavyavahārasya siddhir yathoktā yā dṛśyānupalabdhis tata eva bhavati yatas tasmād anyato noktā |
GSP28durdhpru:4937: sati tasmin pratiṣdhye vastuni yasmād dṛśyānupalabdhir na sambhavati tasmād asambhavāt tataḥ pratiṣedhasiddhiḥ ||
GSP28durdhpru:4938: ca katipayakālavyavadhānena tadudayanimittam iti pūrvavad hetudharmānumānam |
GSP28durdhpru:4941: sā ca svabhāvabhūtaivānumīyata iti tādātmyam eva nibandhanam |
GSP28durdhpru:4942: ādityodayasya tu prabhāvātiśayavatā yogyādinā vibandhasambhavāt nāsty evāvinābhāvaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4944: evaṃ tu yuktam -- ayam udetā astamayaśvastanodayayogya iti |
GSP28durdhpru:4950: etāvad ucyate -- asati tādāmye taduptattau vā kasyacit kvacit pratibandhe tādrūpyeṇa ca gamakatve sarvaṃ sarvatra pratibaddhaṃ tadgamakaṃ prasajyeteti ||
GSP28durdhpru:4951: kāryasvabhāvayor eva tu gamakatvaṃ katham iti bruvataḥ pūrvapakṣavādino 'yam āśayaḥ -- tādātmyatadupattī evānyasya bhaviṣyataḥ, tataś ca gamakatvam iti |
GSP28durdhpru:4952: kāryasvabhāvayor iti dvayo[r u]ccāraṇe cāyaṃ tasya bhāvaḥ
GSP28durdhpru:4955: pūrvapakṣasyotthānam? satyam etat, kevalaṃ tad evā
GSP28durdhpru:4958: atha tata eva kasmād ity āha --
GSP28durdhpru:4959: anyathā ca anupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpteṣu deśakālasvabhāvaviprakṛṣṭeṣv artheṣv ātmapratyakṣanivṛtter abhāvaniścayābhāvāt II-27
GSP28durdhpru:4961: sati vastuni tasyā adṛśyānupalabdheḥ sambhavād ity anyathāśabdārthaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4963: kuta etad -- saty api vastuni tasyāḥ sambhava ity āha --
GSP28durdhpru:4969: deśaś ca kālaś ca svabhāvaś ca tair viprakṛṣṭā iti vigrahaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4971: saty api vastuni tasyā bhāva iṣṭaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4972: kasmān niścayābhāva ity āha -- teṣu pratpattur ātmano yat pratyakṣam tasya nivṛtteḥ kāraṇāt niścayābhāvaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4973: yasmād anupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpteṣu ātmapratyakṣanivṛtter abhāvaniścayābhāvaḥ, tasmāt saty api vastuni ātmaprtyakṣanivṛttilakṣaṇāyā adṛśyānupalabdheḥ sambhavaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4975: pratiṣedhasambhavād ity abhiprāyeṇa pūrvapakṣapravṛtter adoṣa eṣaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4976: pratiṣedhaśabdena vyavahāro 'bhipreta iti pratiṣedhavyavahāra iti vivṛtam
GSP28durdhpru:4979: mūlasāmarthyasthitam abhivyanakti tasmād anyato 'dṛśyasyānupalabdher noktā pratiṣedhasiddhir iti prakṛtena sambandhaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4980: yady adṛśyānupalabdher na bhavati tadānupalabdhitvāviśeṣe vivakṣitāyāpi mā bhūd ity abhipretyāha tatas tāvad iti |
GSP28durdhpru:4981: tasmād asambhavāt kāraṇāt tata iti tata eva dṛśyānupalabdher iti vivakṣitam itarathā nyasyāpi pratiṣedhasiddhikathanaprasaṅgāt ||
GSP28durdhpru:4983: kathaṃ punas tata eveti niyamo labhyate ity abhiprāyavān āha atheti |
GSP28durdhpru:4985: anyathā cety uttaraṃ vyācakṣāṇa ihaiva cchedaṃ darśayati caśabdañ ca yasmādarthe |
GSP28durdhpru:4986: dṛśyānupalabdher uktāt prakārād adṛśyānupalabdher anyaprakāratvam anyathātvaṃ vivakṣitam ācāryasyeti
GSP28durdhpru:4988: atheyaṃ dṛśyānupalabdhiḥ kasmān kāle pramāṇam, kiṃsvabhāvā, kiṃvyāpārā cety āha --
GSP28durdhpru:4993: pratipattuḥ pratyakṣo ghaṭādir arthaḥ, tasya nivṛttir anupalabdhiḥ tadabhāvasvabhāveti yāvat |
GSP28durdhpru:4994: ata evābhāvo na sādhyaḥ svabhāvānupalabdheḥ siddhatvāt |[50]avidyamāno 'pi ca[51]ghaṭādir
GSP28durdhpru:4995: ekajñānasaṃsargiṇi bhūtale[52]bhāsamāne samagrasāmagrīko jñāyamāno dṛśtayā[53]sambhāvitatvāt pratyakṣa uktaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:4998: | tato hi dṛśyamānād arthāt tadbuddheś ca samagradarśanasāmagrīkatvena pratyakṣatayā sambhāvitasya nivṛttir avasīyate |
GSP28durdhpru:4999: tasmād arthajñāne eva pratyakṣasya ghaṭasyābhāva ucyate |
GSP28durdhpru:5000: na tu nivṛttimātram ihābhāvaḥ nivṛttimātrād dṛśyanivṛttyaniścayāt |
GSP28durdhpru:5003: [50] yathā ca pratipattṛpratyakṣanivṛttr anupalabdhiḥ pradeśas tajjñānaṃ
GSP28durdhpru:5010: mūle tv anyathā cānupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpteṣv ity ekavākyatayaivārthaḥ saṅgacchate |
GSP28durdhpru:5014: tathā tu na prakrāntaṃ dharmottareṇeti kim atra kurmaḥ? kuta etad iti sāmānyenoktvā viśeṣaniṣṭhaṃ karoti saty apīti |
GSP28durdhpru:5015: etac ca vigraha ity antaṃ sugamam |
GSP28durdhpru:5017: saty api vastuni asyānupalabdher bhāva iṣṭaḥ |
GSP28durdhpru:5018: anenaitad āha -- nāsmākam atra pramāṇam asti yat saty eva vastuni sā bhavatīti |
GSP28durdhpru:5019: kin tu tasyāṃ satyām api yasmāt pratyayo dolāyate tasmād evam ucyata iti |
GSP28durdhpru:5020: samprati niścayābhāvasyāvadhiṃ prayeṣamāṇa āha kasmāt sakāśād iti |
GSP28durdhpru:5022: nanu yady ayam apādānapraśno na tu hetupraśnas tadā katham idam āha tasya nivṛtteḥ kāraṇān niścayābhāva iti cet |
GSP28durdhpru:5025: niścayābhāvasya śabdena nyāyena jāyamānasyaiṣā prakṛtiḥ kāraṇam |
GSP28durdhpru:5027: ity anena labdhāpādānasaṃjñakād asmād ity arthasya vivakṣitatvāt |
GSP28durdhpru:5030: etac ca pratiṣedhasiddhir ity etad antaṃ sugamam ||
GSP28durdhpru:5031: sampraty anupalabdher anumānajñānahetutvāt prāmāṇyaṃ svabhāvaviśeṣo vyāpāraś cokto 'pi kālapuruṣaviśeṣaparigrahaṇena vaktum athetyādinā
GSP28durdhpru:5037: kevalam ekajñānasaṃsargiṇi dṛśyamāne ghaṭo yadi bhaved dṛśya eva bhaved iti dṛśyaḥ sambhāvitaḥ
GSP28durdhpru:5040: yadi hi dṛśyas tatra bhaved dṛśyānupalambho na bhavet |
GSP28durdhpru:5041: ato dṛśyānupalambhaniścayād dṛśyābhāvaḥ sāmarthyād avasitaḥ na[57]vyavahṛta iti dṛśyānupalambhena
